name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1526
text_en: That's the upside of apathy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1527
text_en: Not *caring.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1528
text_en: Because after a while...I realized that was the only armor I had left.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1529
text_en: Joy, sorrow, anger, envy, fear, it was all defeat.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1530
text_en: So I embraced the nothing. The spiral of apathy. The *indifference.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1531
text_en: But you broke the cycle--the spiral.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1532
text_en: I can't do this right now. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1533
text_en: I had help from the Lotus.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1534
text_en: Then I repaid them by saving their damn system. And...now I'm here. Trying to save this one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1535
text_en: You haven't had an easy time of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1536
text_en: That's life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1537
text_en: Yeah, but you know what? I'm not in it alone this time. I'm not going to take that for granted.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1538
text_en: You're tellin' me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1539
text_en: I could drink to that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo2_1442
text_en: Drifter.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo2_1443
text_en: Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo2_1444
text_en: Sup?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo2_1445
text_en: What're your thoughts about On-lyne?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo2_1446
text_en: Oh. Them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo2_1447
text_en: Do they only have the one song?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo2_1448
text_en: I love them! We didn't have anything like that in Duviri.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo2_1449
text_en: Meh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo2_1450
text_en: Exactly! I just wish they'd STOP.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo2_1451
text_en: Who?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo2_1452
text_en: The band that's everywhere you look.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo2_1453
text_en: We clearly have different tastes in music.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo2_1454
text_en: I just wish they'd STOP.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1540
text_en: I'd like to hear the story.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1541
text_en: Hate to burst your bubble.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1542
text_en: People change.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1543
text_en: Maybe, but...not today.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1544
text_en: No thanks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1545
text_en: What do you mean?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1546
text_en: ...Moody.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1547
text_en: Literally moody. As in the whole thing has *moods.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1548
text_en: It's hard to explain. I'd have to show it to you someday.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1549
text_en: Like one of those colour-changing rings?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1550
text_en: I'd take you up on that - sounds like a trip in more ways than one. If it weren't for...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1551
text_en: If one of those rings could kill you - repeatedly -  yes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1552
text_en: What color-changing rings?! I want a color-changing ring...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1553
text_en: Mm, jury's out. I don't trust them. The rings, that is.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1554
text_en: We were told to trust computers, too - look how that turned out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1555
text_en: Duviri isn't any better. Trust me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1556
text_en: Well, at least computers are real.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1557
text_en: Well, at least here you have *real* company.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1558
text_en: How so?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1559
text_en: Duviri isn't real?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1560
text_en: It's a long story.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1561
text_en: I mean... it's complicated. Things can come in and out of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1562
text_en: People to talk to. Share the experiences with.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1563
text_en: The good, bad...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1564
text_en: You're not alone with just... your stories and imaginary friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1565
text_en: Stories that the Void gave life and turned against you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1566
text_en: And made kill you over, and over, and over... and over...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1567
text_en: I can see why you don't like to talk about this much.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1568
text_en: Yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1569
text_en: I kind of went numb over the years.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1570
text_en: Why does that feel worse in its own right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1571
text_en: We've all met that old soldier, who died on a battlefield -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1572
text_en: - long before he stopped walking and breathing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1573
text_en: One kind of death you can come back from.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1574
text_en: I don't know many soldiers.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1575
text_en: Not really.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1576
text_en: The other you can't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1577
text_en: Right. I forget. You carry yourself like one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1578
text_en: Well. I guess you know some now, hm?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1579
text_en: Like you said. At least here, you're not alone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1580
text_en: Too True, Drifter. Too true.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1581
text_en: Sadly, most never do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1582
text_en: We'll do this another time, then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1583
text_en: So I guess it's real enough.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1584
text_en: But it's based on... things that *aren't* real.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1585
text_en: At what point does a story become reality?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1586
text_en: When you believe in it enough?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1587
text_en: Or when it starts to believe in *you?*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1588
text_en: My head hurts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1589
text_en: Welcome to Duviri.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1590
text_en: You can see why I don't really like talking about it much.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1591
text_en: You're starting to make a lot more sense.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1592
text_en: Little by little.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1593
text_en: Well...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1594
text_en: You'd hate it anyway.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1595
text_en: You're probably right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1596
text_en: Sol almighty, I hate it when you describe it like that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1597
text_en: Sol, you're bloody adorable sometimes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1598
text_en: You come from the damn future, and you lose your mind over a cheap piece of colour-changing trash?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1599
text_en: You know what? Life is full of miserable things. Why not enjoy the fun parts?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1600
text_en: I didn't get out much, remember?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1601
text_en: Fair.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1602
text_en: I'm not saying lose sight of all the serious things that matter, but.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1603
text_en: Why not enjoy the silly things when you can?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1604
text_en: You never know when you might not get another chance.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1605
text_en: Anyway, about Duviri.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1606
text_en: Soooo... about those rings.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1607
text_en: Right. You know what? Let's talk about it another time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1608
text_en: Heh. I'm sure Amir knows where to find one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1609
text_en: Sadly, they're not my area of expertise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1610
text_en: That's... shockingly deep. And a good point.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1611
text_en: Thanks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1612
text_en: I have my moments. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1613
text_en: As for Duviri, let's talk about that another time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1614
text_en: It's shit.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1615
text_en: Well.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1616
text_en: Never mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1617
text_en: The whole "the only way you can leave here is if I'm driving you" thing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1487
text_en: Where'd you learn to fight?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1488
text_en: Trial and error.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1489
text_en: A mentor of mine, named Teshin.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1490
text_en: [Ignore.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1491
text_en: Sounds like a great way to get killed.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1492
text_en: Oh, and I did. A lot. Over, and over, and over... And over...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1493
text_en: And over...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1494
text_en: In Duviri, in that loop you told me about.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1495
text_en: I really don't want to talk about this. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1496
text_en: It's more of a spiral, really. Point being, I got a lot of practice.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1497
text_en: Nothing teaches you how to fight like knowing exactly what you're trying to avoid.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1498
text_en: Sol. I can understand that feeling, though I've never died.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1499
text_en: I... well... you have, though. Don't you remember?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1500
text_en: It's not exactly something most people have to deal with.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1501
text_en: I don't, really...It's hazy. And I'm glad for it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1502
text_en: Yeah. Because if you did, you might wind up like *me.* [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1503
text_en: Honestly? You're lucky it's hazy. I died so many times, I stopped caring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1504
text_en: That's not what I - whatever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1505
text_en: How could you stop caring?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1506
text_en: How'd you feel if I asked you that question?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1507
text_en: You volunteering to be my therapist?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1508
text_en: Being trapped alone in the Void does weird things to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1509
text_en: I can't do this right now. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1510
text_en: That's fair. How about we come back to it, should we get to that point?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1511
text_en: Well, good talk, then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1512
text_en: Deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1513
text_en: Pass.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1514
text_en: Hard pass.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1515
text_en: An elite Dax soldier- which I *just* remembered means nothing to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1516
text_en: I'll summarize. It means he has the patience to put up with me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1517
text_en: Heh. Sounds like a hell of a tutor. And someone I'd like to meet.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1518
text_en: I'd still be lost in Duviri if it weren't for him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1519
text_en: He gave me the push I needed.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1520
text_en: Sounds like he gave you the push you needed.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1521
text_en: We all need that person, sometimes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1522
text_en: Yeah. And he coached me on how to fight. On how to beat Dominus Thrax.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_1523
text_en: That I accidentally turned into a tyrannical despot who had me executed in creative ways for centuries? Yep.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1524
text_en: Thrax was... a character from a story, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo4_1525
text_en: But... why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1618
text_en: What's it like, Duviri?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1619
text_en: It has its upsides.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1620
text_en: Like what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1621
text_en: It can be beautiful. Breathtaking, even.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1622
text_en: There's a freedom that comes from familiarity. It's hard to describe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1623
text_en: Through all of the bullshit, all the nonsense, it's like nowhere else I've ever seen.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1624
text_en: I know every rock. Every tree. Every hanging lantern.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1625
text_en: There are no surprises anymore, for better or worse. That can be comforting as much as it can be soul-sucking.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1626
text_en: Soul-sucking?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1627
text_en: Didn't you say it was a world from a book?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1628
text_en: Yeah. "Tales from Duviri." The Void snatched it from me. From what I am.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1629
text_en: I guess I decided I wanted a nice view.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1630
text_en: While dying repeatedly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1631
text_en: Until apathy set in.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1632
text_en: The only thing worse than suffering is apathy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1633
text_en: I'm still really curious about that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1634
text_en: I have a hard time believing you ever gave in to apathy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1635
text_en: And I still really don't want to talk about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1636
text_en: You don't like it when I want to talk about *your* dirty laundry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1637
text_en: Sometimes it's better to leave rocks un-flipped. But fine. If you won't let it go.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1638
text_en: So, apathy? It's hard to believe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1639
text_en: Fair. Another time, then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo3_1640
text_en: O...kay. Never mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1641
text_en: Short answer? Time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1642
text_en: I don't care if you believe me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1643
text_en: I ran out of other emotions.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo3_1644
text_en: I got bored.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1455
text_en: I'd love to take your Atomicycle for a ride.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1456
text_en: Hey mind if I borrow your Atomicycle? ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1457
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1458
text_en: If you touch it I'll murder you in your Sol-loving sleep.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1459
text_en: And no one will find the corpse.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1460
text_en: Trust me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1461
text_en: C'mon. What's the worst that could happen?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1462
text_en: Okay, you drive. I'll sit on the back. Joyride.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1463
text_en: *No.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1464
text_en: Forget I said anything. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1465
text_en: Chill! I was just playing around!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1466
text_en: How was I supposed to know?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1467
text_en: That's what the winky face was for!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1468
text_en: Never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1469
text_en: What "winky face?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1470
text_en: Tilt your head to the left and look for the face. That's called an "emoticon."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1471
text_en: You're starting to make a lot more sense, now...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1472
text_en: Emotion + Icon. Emoticon.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1473
text_en: Why not?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1474
text_en: Oh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1475
text_en: Well...shit. I think I need to apologize to Aoi for...a lot. Be right back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1476
text_en: Fine. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1477
text_en: Because that thing is my pride and joy. And you'll take it and ruin it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1478
text_en: Why would you assume I'd take something of yours and - oh...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1479
text_en: Fine. I'll go get my own. And it'll be cooler anyway. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1480
text_en: I'm sure it will be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1481
text_en: Point taken.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo3_1482
text_en: I'll just... use my own instead...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1483
text_en: You might be a lot of things, Drifter. But at least you're not stupid.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1484
text_en: Sigh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1485
text_en: I came off harsh. Tell you what. When you get your own? We'll go riding together.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo3_1486
text_en: They sound a lot better than those messed-up horses you mentioned.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1645
text_en: Can I ask you a... potentially strange question?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1646
text_en: Define "strange." Remember where I'm from.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1647
text_en: Try me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1648
text_en: Maybe later. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1649
text_en: ...Right. Fair enough.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1650
text_en: So, about your food...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1651
text_en: You've been poisoning it, haven't you?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1652
text_en: What about it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1653
text_en: You wish. No getting out that easy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1654
text_en: I'm curious why you cut it up into... perfect squares. Even the pizza.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1655
text_en: Honestly? It kind of reminds me of... I don't know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1656
text_en: Force of habit. That's how the rations were served on the Zariman, the ship that got stuck in the void.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1657
text_en: Because. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1658
text_en: Home?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1659
text_en: The ship was your home?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1660
text_en: Good talk.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1661
text_en: Actually, sorry. I don't want to talk about it. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1662
text_en: The only home I've had where I wasn't alone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1663
text_en: Kind of? It's complicated.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1664
text_en: That's fine. I've been there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1665
text_en: Sounds it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1666
text_en: Well, I guess I could try making square spaghetti if you want.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1667
text_en: When it wasn't just me, myself, and my cubed food rations.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1668
text_en: So. I guess I do it because there's comfort in it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1669
text_en: I know how you feel. Routines can help you feel grounded, especially when everything's gone to shit.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1670
text_en: I tell you what - I make a mean cubed omelette.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1671
text_en: Thanks. But... gross. I'll pass.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1672
text_en: I'll tell you what. If you make it, I'll eat it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1673
text_en: On second thought, good call.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1674
text_en: Game on.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1675
text_en: That sounds amazing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo1_1676
text_en: A what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo1_1677
text_en: You're in for a treat.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurSpaghetti_1678
text_en: ARTHUR WHY

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurSpaghetti_1679
text_en: The texture... dear Sol... the texture...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurSpaghetti_1680
text_en: You okay?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurSpaghetti_1681
text_en: I know that square spaghetti didn't turn out... quite right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurSpaghetti_1682
text_en: WHY WAS IT BOUNCY?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurSpaghetti_1683
text_en: Why do you hate me...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurSpaghetti_1684
text_en: The gelatin balance was off. It'll be better next time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurSpaghetti_1685
text_en: THERE WILL BE NO NEXT TIME

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurSpaghetti_1686
text_en: Please have mercy...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurSpaghetti_1687
text_en: I'll make you some soup. Normal, non-square soup. How's that sound?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurSpaghetti_1688
text_en: NO MORE POISON

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurSpaghetti_1689
text_en: Just... no gelatin.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurSpaghetti_1690
text_en: Nah. Poison's not my speed. Trust me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurSpaghetti_1691
text_en: Promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1692
text_en: So. How many of you are there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1693
text_en: Why're you asking?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1694
text_en: Just me and the kid that I know of.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1695
text_en: None of your business. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1696
text_en: That you know of?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1697
text_en: You've been inside my head. I guess I'm curious to know more about what's going on inside yours.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1698
text_en: Technically, I'm not in your head.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1699
text_en: You sure? It can get strange in here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1700
text_en: I'm just driving your body.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1701
text_en: Have you met my sister? You've got nothing on her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1702
text_en: Considering what she's been through? I think she has the right to be "strange."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1703
text_en: We'll see about that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1704
text_en: Nope. Still weird, and I still hate it when you say it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1705
text_en: She was only marginally more normal when we were children.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1706
text_en: Something to look forward to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1707
text_en: Anyway. Seriously, how many of you *are* there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1708
text_en: Why, fantasizing about two of me? ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1709
text_en: Don't flatter yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1710
text_en: At the rate my life is going? Duplicates would be pretty mundane, honestly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1711
text_en: Who knows how many more universes there could be out there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1712
text_en: Picture it. Drifters, as far as the eye can see...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1713
text_en: More versions of you? Me? Us?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1714
text_en: Poor sods.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1715
text_en: Maybe there's one where we're dating...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1716
text_en: If it makes you feel better, I bet there's at least *one* where you won the fight. :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1717
text_en: Raise one for all the Alternate Arthurs and Different Drifters.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1718
text_en: I repeat: Poor sods.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1719
text_en: Har, har.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1720
text_en: I can drink to that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1721
text_en: Maybe I'd finally get my laundry folded.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1722
text_en: Can you imagine the arguing? And the sass?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1723
text_en: I don't know, I think it'd be pretty awesome.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1724
text_en: Speak for yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1725
text_en: Absolutely not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1726
text_en: HAH.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1727
text_en: To be fair, I'm not sure I'd want to deal with a room full of Arthurs.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1728
text_en: Although... more Drifters = more laundry...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1729
text_en: Damn. Thwarted again!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1730
text_en: Well, let's just hope we don't end up with Infinite Laundry, yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1731
text_en: Bad enough we have to deal with Quincy's stinking up the joint...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1732
text_en: All of us, glowering at each other in silence. Brooding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1733
text_en: We'd at least get things done, I suppose.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_3665
text_en: I don't want to talk about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1734
text_en: You could open up an amazing series of restaurants. ...Sans the square spaghetti, of course.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1735
text_en: Grumpy but effective. There are worse ways to be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1736
text_en: All fighting over who lost whose Tommy keys...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1737
text_en: You will never let me live that down, will you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1738
text_en: Someday. Today is not that day. ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo2_1739
text_en: Nope. It still haunts my nightmares.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1740
text_en: Heh. I suppose that's fair.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1741
text_en: Very true.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo2_1742
text_en: Yeah, yeah. Very funny.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1743
text_en: Ever sit there and think about how many people you've killed?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1744
text_en: I try not to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1745
text_en: What a way to start a conversation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1746
text_en: Sometimes. Usually when I'm trying to fall asleep.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1747
text_en: I think about it like a high score.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1748
text_en: Whatever gets you through the nights, I suppose.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1749
text_en: Like counting sheep, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1750
text_en: Heh. They don't promote soldiers for social skills.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1751
text_en: I played that game for a while. But they find a way in.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1752
text_en: Worst. Sheep. Ever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1753
text_en: What's a... "sheep?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1754
text_en: Sol, I feel that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1755
text_en: Sol, that's bloody adorable. Thanks for the laugh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1756
text_en: Do you need to talk?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1757
text_en: I thought I did. Though I might be changing my mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1758
text_en: Truth.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1759
text_en: Eh, you seem to have done all right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1760
text_en: Too kind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1761
text_en: Good call. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1762
text_en: Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1763
text_en: This is the bit I never understood. How do you start talking about this kind of bullshit?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1764
text_en: I won't force you to talk if you don't want to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1765
text_en: I'll go first, then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1766
text_en: Not my job to figure that out for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1767
text_en: Thanks. We'll try this another time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1768
text_en: I try not to think too much about what I've had to do to get through life. Because I don't have anybody to talk to about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1769
text_en: I only had myself to talk to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1770
text_en: I've never even really had friends. You and the others are the closest I've ever come to... belonging somewhere.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1771
text_en: How sad is that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo2_1772
text_en: At least you've had the option to talk if you've wanted to. But hey. If you need me? I'm here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1773
text_en: I'm not sure I like it when you make sense.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo2_1774
text_en: I can't do this today. But thanks. This...means a lot.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1775
text_en: So, how'd you wind up in Duviri in the first place?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1776
text_en: That's... a really easy question with a really hard answer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1777
text_en: My other option was to lose my mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1778
text_en: It's one of the best vacation spots.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1779
text_en: Well, I'm listening.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1780
text_en: I'd rather not get into this. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1781
text_en: Winding up in an imaginary-turned-real Void realm isn't like walking to the corner store.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1782
text_en: It's not exactly a short story.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1783
text_en: What?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1784
text_en: It's a long story. A really long story.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1785
text_en: I'm going to assume that's sarcasm.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1786
text_en: I cope through humor. I'm trying to deflect.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1787
text_en: Yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1788
text_en: What was your first clue?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1789
text_en: This is a really uncomfortable topic for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1790
text_en: Good thing I'm sitting, then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1791
text_en: All right, all right... Buckle up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1792
text_en: Can we do this another time?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1793
text_en: Sure. But I'm keeping you to that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1794
text_en: The other option is to cry constantly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1795
text_en: The thing about the past is, you get through it. But it can still hurt to talk about.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1796
text_en: Do you want to do this another time?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1797
text_en: Don't I know it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1798
text_en: Now's fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1799
text_en: Never's fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1800
text_en: Yeah. Later.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1801
text_en: Good talk.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1802
text_en: If the emotions are what hurts, keep it to the facts. Let's start there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1803
text_en: Look mate, if this is an uncomfortable topic, just say so.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1804
text_en: Sorry. You're right. I don't like talking about this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1805
text_en: I'm not being defensive.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1806
text_en: I didn't say you were being - never mind. We'll do this another time, then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1807
text_en: Can I ask why not?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1808
text_en: It... it's messy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1809
text_en: Do you like talking about your screwed up past?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1810
text_en: Messy how? Body count?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1811
text_en: No. I don't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1812
text_en: The void screws with everything. Timelines, reality, your head. Messy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1813
text_en: You're thinking like a soldier. Messy because of what it did to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1814
text_en: I'm starting to figure that out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1815
text_en: But sometimes, turning these rocks over is how you learn to trust people.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1816
text_en: Gnnnhhh... Fine. But you owe me. A story for a story.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1817
text_en: Another time, maybe?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1818
text_en: Pass. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1819
text_en: Deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_3654
text_en: All right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1820
text_en: We'll cover the squishy bits another time. Deal?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1821
text_en: Easier said than done with Duviri, but...deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1822
text_en: On second thought, no. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1823
text_en: The Man in the Wall is a lying, murdering bastard.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1824
text_en: We're all made up of the stories we're taught.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1825
text_en: Hell of a way to start. I don't disagree, mind you. But hell of a way to start.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1826
text_en: How so?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1827
text_en: It's what it all comes back to in the end. That *thing* that haunts us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1828
text_en: The stories we learn changes the world around us. In my case it's literal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1829
text_en: The Void made our parents go insane. They were trying to eat us, Arthur. Then that *thing* showed up. Offered us powers.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1830
text_en: But I'm getting ahead of myself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1831
text_en: Said the powers would save us all. But he didn't mean me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1832
text_en: I was left behind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1833
text_en: Two important things about the Void: One. It makes you go nuts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1834
text_en: Two: "Conceptual Embodiment." It takes things from your head and makes them real.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1835
text_en: We had a book of stories written by Entrati's daughter about how not to go nuts in the void. And my mind snapped back to those.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1836
text_en: So. Why did I go to Duviri?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1837
text_en: Because the Man in the Wall wanted to play games. Because everybody has abandoned me my entire life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1838
text_en: Because those stories said "come play with me. It's safe here. Let's go on adventures!"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1938
text_en: The Void made a kingdom of sand from my memories and I grew up playing with storybook friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1940
text_en: Until I outgrew them. And those friends became my nightmares.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1942
text_en: And Dominus Thrax began executing me again, and again, and again...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1943
text_en: So. Yeah. *That's* how I wound up in Duviri, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1944
text_en: Because of the stories I was taught.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1939
text_en: I went to Duviri because I didn't have a choice. Because the people there that the Void made? They were my friends, even if they weren't real.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1941
text_en: Until those friends became my nightmares.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1945
text_en: And began executing me again, and again, and again...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1946
text_en: So. Yeah. *That's* how I wound up in Duviri, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1947
text_en: Because of the Man in the Wall. And Albrecht. And the Orokin. And all the stupid games everybody plays.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1948
text_en: I... feel like I just opened a serious can of worms.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1949
text_en: Orowyrms, actually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1950
text_en: You started it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1951
text_en: I warned you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1952
text_en: What?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1953
text_en: That I did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1954
text_en: That you did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo4_1955
text_en: Never mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1956
text_en: Well, it sounds like I owe you a drink...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_1957
text_en: I feel like we'll be discussing this whole Duviri thing again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1839
text_en: What made you want to become a soldier?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1840
text_en: What was it like growing up, you and Eleanor?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1841
text_en: Tell me about yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1842
text_en: Yeah. Isn't that how this is supposed to work?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1843
text_en: What. Just like that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1844
text_en: What's the problem?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1845
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1846
text_en: Okay then, never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1847
text_en: Sweet Sol, you--

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1848
text_en: Right. Stranded in an alternate dimension.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1849
text_en: You're less used to "people" than I am.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_2165
text_en: Ooookay never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1850
text_en: Ouch. Touchy subject?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1851
text_en: Wait. What?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1852
text_en: Do you think I know you well enough to jump into that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1853
text_en: No, probably not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1854
text_en: I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1855
text_en: I'm just trying to get to know you better.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1856
text_en: Going right into my deep personal history isn't the way to do it, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1857
text_en: So how am I supposed to do it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1858
text_en: Do I just stop now, or...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1859
text_en: No, it's fine... go ahead.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1860
text_en: Ask some questions.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1861
text_en: I don't know, ask questions?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1862
text_en: You have to buy a man a few drinks first.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1863
text_en: Drinks first. *Then* personal questions. Got it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1864
text_en: Not worth the trouble, never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1865
text_en: Heh. At least you learn quick.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1866
text_en: No skin off my back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1867
text_en: Um... favorite color?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1868
text_en: Guess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1869
text_en: Um... middle name.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1870
text_en: First pet.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1871
text_en: Guess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1872
text_en: Black

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1873
text_en: Green

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1874
text_en: Blue

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1875
text_en: Red

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1876
text_en: Heh. No. But that's Eleanor's.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1877
text_en: Nope. Sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1878
text_en: Wrong. Sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1879
text_en: On the first try, too. How'd you know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1880
text_en: Or maybe it's purple?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1881
text_en: It changes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1882
text_en: I don't know that much about you two, actually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1883
text_en: Black isn't even a real color, anyway. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1884
text_en: Didn't figure you for the pedantic type.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1885
text_en: And I'm not about to start unloading family history to you, so don't try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1886
text_en: I don't *know* you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1887
text_en: I'd like to change that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1888
text_en: And with that attitude, you won't. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1889
text_en: Huge loss.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1890
text_en: Something to work toward, I suppose.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1891
text_en: It's red.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1892
text_en: The bandana you have around your skana.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1893
text_en: You just "feel" like a red guy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1894
text_en: Good eyes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1895
text_en: A long story for another day. After drinks. Anyway.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1896
text_en: How'd you get that sword, anyway? It never seems to leave your side.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1897
text_en: Did this get you what you were looking for?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1898
text_en: Now you're sounding like Eleanor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1899
text_en: Braxton

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1900
text_en: Herbert

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1901
text_en: James

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1902
text_en: Petersham

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1903
text_en: Dignified. Elegant.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1904
text_en: If it was, I'd never admit it. Luckily it isn't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1905
text_en: How - no. Someone told you!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1906
text_en: Who told you?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1907
text_en: What?! HAH!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1918
text_en: Wrong.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1919
text_en: Let me put you out of your misery, or we'll be at this all day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1920
text_en: It's James.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1921
text_en: How cute.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1922
text_en: How boring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1923
text_en: Yeah, well. Not like I chose it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1908
text_en: It was a lucky guess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1909
text_en: You just "feel" like a James.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1910
text_en: That's a *place,* not a name, you daftie!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1911
text_en: Sorry I'm not up to date on my 20th-Century Britannic names!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1912
text_en: How was I supposed to know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1913
text_en: I think I'm going to cry, I'm laughing so hard.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1914
text_en: PETERSHAM!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1915
text_en: Careful, or it's going to be what I call you now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1916
text_en: Yeah, yeah. Laugh it up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1917
text_en: It's James, by the way. And thanks for the laugh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1924
text_en: Yeah, we'll call that good enough for now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1925
text_en: Sure, if that's all you're willing to share.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1926
text_en: What were your lives like, before all this?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1927
text_en: I take after the smart one. ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1928
text_en: Har har.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1929
text_en: Roger that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1930
text_en: Too soon?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1931
text_en: There's a big gap between "what's your favourite colour" and "tell me your family history."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1932
text_en: There's a big gap between "what's your middle name" and "tell me your family history."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1933
text_en: There's a big gap between "what was your first pet" and "tell me your family history."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1934
text_en: There's a big gap between "ask me some silly questions" and "tell me your family history."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_1935
text_en: It was worth a try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1936
text_en: Too soon.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_1937
text_en: Valiant effort.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1958
text_en: Hey, Arthur

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1959
text_en: Hey, James

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1960
text_en: Hey, Petersham

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1961
text_en: Oh, no no no.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1962
text_en: Hey, Buddy

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1963
text_en: We are NOT doing that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1964
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1965
text_en: Uh... Hey, Arthur?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1966
text_en: Never mind, then...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1967
text_en: Better.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1968
text_en: Yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1969
text_en: I was just joking around.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1970
text_en: Oh, come on. I think it's cute.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1971
text_en: You with a five 'o clock shadow. ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1972
text_en: Mmhm.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1973
text_en: I have a name already. And a lot of things are cuter than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1974
text_en: Bunnies. Puppies. Kittens.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1975
text_en: Okay, okay. I'll let it drop.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1976
text_en: Flirting to change the subject?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1977
text_en: Nice tactic.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1978
text_en: Did it work?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1979
text_en: But it's just for fun.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1980
text_en: The flirting or the nickname?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1981
text_en: ...Yes? I'm confused now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1982
text_en: The flirting.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1983
text_en: The nickname.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1984
text_en: Sigh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1985
text_en: Great. You're one of THOSE.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1986
text_en: Fine, you can use it. Just...keep it between us, all right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1987
text_en: Deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1988
text_en: Actually, never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1989
text_en: Was there something you wanted to talk about?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1990
text_en: No deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1991
text_en: Should've known.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1992
text_en: I'm curious about something. But I don't know if you'd be willing to talk about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1993
text_en: Ask. If I don't want to talk, I won't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1994
text_en: How'd you get that skana of yours?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1995
text_en: What brought you here? To Hllvania?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1996
text_en: What made you want to be a soldier?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_1997
text_en: What was it like, growing up with Eleanor?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1999
text_en: Simple answer? Techrot.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_1998
text_en: Simple answer? Entrati.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_2000
text_en: What's the non-simple answer?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_2001
text_en: Great. We'll leave it there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_2002
text_en: Ugh. Look, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_2003
text_en: I'd... really rather not get into that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_2004
text_en: It's a long story. And it's not that I don't trust you, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_2005
text_en: We've been through some strange things together.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_2006
text_en: There's just a difference between fighting beside somebody...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_2007
text_en: No, I get it. Maybe another time, then? After I buy you a few rounds first?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_2008
text_en: Chicken. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_2009
text_en: Now you're getting it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_2010
text_en: Sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2011
text_en: What's the deal with Aoi?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2012
text_en: So, about you and Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2013
text_en: Can you be more specific?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2014
text_en: Yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2015
text_en: What's she like?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2016
text_en: You know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2018
text_en: Never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2019
text_en: Everybody thinks I'm in charge. Nope. I'm just the one they listen to. She's the real heart of the team.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2020
text_en: We'd all be long dead without her. Including me. Shit, mostly me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2021
text_en: Those are winky faces.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2022
text_en: I don't, actually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2023
text_en: What?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2024
text_en: Oh, grow up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2025
text_en: Are you two dating?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2026
text_en: How long have you known each other?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2027
text_en: Way back. We served together in the ICR. She's my best mate. Couldn't do any of this nonsense without her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2028
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2029
text_en: International Crisis Response. The "peace keeping" unit that got us into this shithole mess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2030
text_en: Huh. Neat. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2031
text_en: ICR?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2032
text_en: We've been friends for a long time. Closer for longer than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2033
text_en: But if you're itching to ask more about our past, I'm going to have to stop you here. It isn't my story to tell.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2034
text_en: You'll have to ask her about it. But I'll warn you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2035
text_en: Just don't be wearing a whole lot of metal near any important body parts when you do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2036
text_en: So... you're saying she's single?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2037
text_en: *Were* you two dating?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2038
text_en: I guess this is just me asking, in a round about way... if you're single.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2039
text_en: You'll have to take that up with her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2040
text_en: Just a word of advice.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2041
text_en: Be sure not to be wearing a whole lot of metal near any important bits when you do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2042
text_en: Heh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2043
text_en: Some things aren't your business, you know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2044
text_en: Well, that's a yes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2045
text_en: My cue to back off?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2070
text_en: Final warning.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2071
text_en: Leave it alone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2046
text_en: Yep.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2072
text_en: If you wanna pry?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2047
text_en: Me? I thought this was about Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2048
text_en: She was just a decoy, I'm really more interested in you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2049
text_en: I figured if I came out and asked you if *you* were single, you'd march over here and punch me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2050
text_en: Uh oh looks like I need to do a forced software update might loose conne -- [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2051
text_en: Hm.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2052
text_en: Never pictured you for a flirt.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2053
text_en: Am I really that unapproachable?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2054
text_en: Wait. Don't answer that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2055
text_en: Does the flirting bother you? I'll stop if it does.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2056
text_en: I haven't had a lot of practice, so I'm pretty bad at it, I know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2057
text_en: Well?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2058
text_en: So?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2059
text_en: You don't have to tell me if you don't *want* to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2060
text_en: Great! I mean, oh, what a shame.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2061
text_en: Like you wouldn't be able to figure it out, given enough time. We all live in the same bloody mall.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2062
text_en: Sigh. Yes, I'm single.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2063
text_en: Good to know. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2064
text_en: Hah. Just. Let me ask. On the stubborn scale of 1 to 10, how screwed am I?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2065
text_en: I'm going to run you down like a kubrodon hunting a pobber on the Venusian plains.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo5_2066
text_en: It's not serious. You're just too much fun to tease.
