name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2067
text_en: Get in the queue with everybody else.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2068
text_en: If I had any clue what literally any of that meant, I might know how to react.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2069
text_en: So I guess I'll take it as a compliment and move on.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2073
text_en: Oh good, I'm a target dummy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2074
text_en: If it really bothered me, you'd know. Trust me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo5_2075
text_en: But if you've got to make an arse out of yourself, do it here. No need to make a fool of yourself in front of the others.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2076
text_en: Hey Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2077
text_en: Hey Sexy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2078
text_en: Well, I could call you *Petersham* if you prefer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2079
text_en: Do you prefer "handsome?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2080
text_en: ... Excuse me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2081
text_en: Yes?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2082
text_en: Hah, only joking.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2083
text_en: No. Hard no.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2084
text_en: You're no fun.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2085
text_en: Sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2086
text_en: Whatever you say.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2087
text_en: Try again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2088
text_en: Cute?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2089
text_en: Distinguished?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2090
text_en: Ruggedly manly?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2091
text_en: Please give up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2092
text_en: Okay, now I know you're pulling my leg.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2093
text_en: Sorry. I'm done.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2094
text_en: Maybe I'm being sincere.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2095
text_en: Are you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2096
text_en: What did you want?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2097
text_en: Sigh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2098
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2099
text_en: Honestly? Yes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2100
text_en: You have a very odd way of letting a man know you find him attractive.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2101
text_en: You aren't exactly the easiest person to approach, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2102
text_en: I don't have a lot of practice at this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2103
text_en: Forget it. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2104
text_en: So I'm trying to break through the ice any way I can.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2105
text_en: So pardon me for flailing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2106
text_en: I know your past is a touchy subject, but...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2107
text_en: That skana of yours, I'm really curious about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2108
text_en: I'm still really curious about that skana.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2109
text_en: Ask. Nothing's stopped you before.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2110
text_en: I know, I know. And you've already tried.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2111
text_en: I... well, if you're serious, now's not the right time, but...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2112
text_en: Bless your stubborn heart for consistency, I suppose.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2113
text_en: Rain check?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2114
text_en: Rain check. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2115
text_en: I'll pass. Sorry. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2116
text_en: All right then. I'm going to go off and have a serious think.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2117
text_en: I am *extremely* stubborn, that's true.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2118
text_en: Is it working this time?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2119
text_en: This time? No. But.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2120
text_en: But be honest, am I doomed here?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2121
text_en: Very. Very doomed. :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2122
text_en: Mmm, I'm keeping my options open.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2124
text_en: Actually, never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2125
text_en: The red bandana that's tied to the blade. Whose was it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2126
text_en: How'd you get it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2146
text_en: The hard way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2127
text_en: Nobodies. It's my favourite colour, remember?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2128
text_en: Nobodies. It's my favourite colour.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2129
text_en: Why do I get the feeling that's not the truth?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2130
text_en: Great.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2131
text_en: Good.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2132
text_en: Leave it alone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2133
text_en: I don't particularly care.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2134
text_en: I get it. You're trying to make friends. Get to know me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2135
text_en: And I'm not making it easy on you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2136
text_en: There are some cans of worms I'm not bloody willing to open for you yet.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2137
text_en: This is one of them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2138
text_en: Didn't mean to upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2139
text_en: Okay, okay...sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2140
text_en: No need to apologize.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2141
text_en: I'm not upset.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2142
text_en: No grudges held. I'm not an easy man to get along with, sometimes. Sol knows a lot of people around here have learned that lesson...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2143
text_en: I'm just not the easily sharing type. But maybe well get there, someday.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2144
text_en: Here's a toast to Someday, then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2145
text_en: Can I ask how you got the skana in the first place?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2147
text_en: Ouch.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2148
text_en: Wow. Foreboding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2149
text_en: I get to be dramatic when I earned the sword by getting stabbed with it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2150
text_en: Courtesy of Doctor E. Ran me straight through.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2151
text_en: Jerk.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2152
text_en: *Ouch.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2153
text_en: I had stronger words for it at the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2154
text_en: But we'll go with that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2155
text_en: Anytime. Well, almost anytime.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2156
text_en: Thanks, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2157
text_en: The red bandana tied on it. Who did it belong to?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo1_2158
text_en: Sheesh, didn't realize you'd make such a big deal out of this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2159
text_en: Knobhead.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo4_2030
text_en: Smart.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo4_2031
text_en: Longer answer another time? Over drinks, maybe?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2163
text_en: Heh. Good to know. Something to look forward to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo1_2164
text_en: Points for honesty.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2166
text_en: How'd you wind up here in the first place?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2167
text_en: Joined up with the ICR.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2168
text_en: So, why join the ICR?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2169
text_en: The what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2170
text_en: Gotcha. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2171
text_en: International Crisis Response.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2172
text_en: Basically, a neutral, peace-keeping organization that's supposed to deploy military units as a last resort.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2173
text_en: "Supposed" to?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2174
text_en: That seemed to have worked out great.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2175
text_en: I'd like to deploy *your* military unit. ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2176
text_en: Mmhm.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2177
text_en: I lost the taste for serving in the Britannic army.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2178
text_en: Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2179
text_en: Food was that bad, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2180
text_en: I took offense to their methodology, let's say.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2181
text_en: That's not foreboding, or anything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2182
text_en: Can you give me more than that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2183
text_en: I could.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2184
text_en: Right, well.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2186
text_en: HAH! Someday, I'll live that down. Not today though, I see.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2185
text_en: Is that where you learned to cook square spaghetti?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2187
text_en: Nope.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2188
text_en: I can still taste it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2189
text_en: Fair enough.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2190
text_en: Hah!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2192
text_en: Well, MRE's are pretty vile, but that wasn't why I left.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2193
text_en: (They make great explosives though - just don't tell Amir.)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2194
text_en: Lol, noted.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2195
text_en: Mmm... Semi-tasty explosions...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2196
text_en: I'm trying to get to know you better.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2197
text_en: You've been curious for a while about my army life. Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2198
text_en: Why're you asking about my army life?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2199
text_en: Just making conversation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2200
text_en: You know how I feel.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2201
text_en: Right... right...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2202
text_en: Well, next time maybe go for the weather.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2203
text_en: It's not a story I like telling.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2204
text_en: But...fine. You've been a good sport. I'll give you an inch.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2205
text_en: What do you want to know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2206
text_en: You got it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2207
text_en: Am I pushing the wrong buttons again?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2208
text_en: Can I level with you for a second, Arthur?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2209
text_en: I get the feeling this is a touchy subject.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2210
text_en: Well, if you don't want to talk, I won't make you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2211
text_en: Sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2212
text_en: It is.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2213
text_en: Well, then, never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2214
text_en: I'm not trying to upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2215
text_en: I'm just trying to get to know you. Really, I am.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2216
text_en: Everybody has their shit. Their painful shrapnel they'd rather not dig out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2269
text_en: I'm just trying to get to know you more.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2270
text_en: Sheesh, sorry. Just trying to have a conversation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2217
text_en: Appreciate it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2271
text_en: Try chatting about the weather next time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2272
text_en: I know. And I'm not mad. I'm just not ready to spill, yet. Another time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2218
text_en: Actually, never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2219
text_en: And I'm doing this because I care about you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2220
text_en: And I'm doing this because I want to be a better friend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2221
text_en: So, I'm sorry if I'm bothering you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2222
text_en: So, if this isn't the right way to go about it, I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2223
text_en: I just want to know what made Arthur, *Arthur.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2224
text_en: Because I haven't been able to stop thinking about you since I've shown up here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2225
text_en: I just want to know what made Arthur, *Arthur.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2226
text_en: I know you're not trying to be rude. Or pry for the sake of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2227
text_en: But digging out my painful shrapnel isn't exactly a pleasant conversation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2228
text_en: I know, and I still owe you that rain check.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2230
text_en: I'm just not the kind of man who rushes into these kinds of things -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2231
text_en: Oh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2232
text_en: I get it. I'll back off.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2233
text_en: I didn't realize the stories I was asking for were painful.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2234
text_en: I... honestly had no idea.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2235
text_en: Heh. That explains why you're so bloody nosy, I suppose.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2236
text_en: Look, I'm just not the kind of man who jumps into these kinds of things.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2237
text_en: Relationships, or painful stories about my past.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2238
text_en: Relationships, or digging out painful shrapnel from my past.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2239
text_en: So you might just have to be patient. Or stubborn.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2240
text_en: Something tells me you might have those qualities, however.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2241
text_en: We'll see.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2242
text_en: You have no idea.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2243
text_en: I can be patient.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2244
text_en: I didn't realize the stories I was asking for were painful.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2245
text_en: It's fine. Everybody has their shit.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2246
text_en: Yeah, but I'm still sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2247
text_en: Thanks. I'm sure we'll get there. Just...not today.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2248
text_en: That's fair.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2249
text_en: Rain check?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2250
text_en: On what? The soldier stories or the whole "I have feelings for you" thing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2251
text_en: lol. Yeah, rain check. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2252
text_en: Pass.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2253
text_en: Yes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2254
text_en: And if you don't want to be standing around waiting for me? I get it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2255
text_en: Sol knows that won't be the first time that's happened.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2256
text_en: What's that mean?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2257
text_en: I can't imagine why. You're so approachable and talkative.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2258
text_en: Exactly what it sounds like.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2259
text_en: Okay, then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2260
text_en: You don't like to give up an inch, do you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2261
text_en: Now you're getting it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2262
text_en: Well. I suppose if you're willing to stand around put up with me...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2263
text_en: Sigh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2264
text_en: No. It's fine. I'm not saying you can't ask. I'm just saying I might not want to tell you the answers just yet.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2265
text_en: I can be patient.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2266
text_en: Don't worry, I'm stubborn.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2267
text_en: Never mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2268
text_en: I'm learning that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2273
text_en: All right. Fine. What do you want to know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2274
text_en: Why did you quit the Brittanic army?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2275
text_en: So, why a peacekeeping organization?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2276
text_en: When you enlist, you enlist to serve.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2277
text_en:
When you join the military,
you tend to do it for a reason.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2278
text_en: Your Prince. Your Country. Your brothers & sisters in arms.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2291
text_en: Some people do it because they have nowhere else to go.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2279
text_en: And the innocents you're meant to be protecting in the first place.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2292
text_en: Some for glory. Some for power. Some to feed the voice in their heads that says "kill."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2280
text_en: But a funny thing happens, when people get into positions of power. The higher you go, the smaller people look.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2281
text_en: The more people look less like themselves, and more like...dots.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2282
text_en: Like numbers on a piece of paper. Like incidentals.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2283
text_en: I got real bloody sick of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2293
text_en: Some are idiots who do it to be noble. To protect. To be heroes. Like me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2294
text_en: I figured the ICR might be a better place to scratch that itch than His Majesty's Royal Army.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2295
text_en: But it was just more of the same.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2284
text_en: I get the feeling there's more to it than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2285
text_en: And?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2286
text_en:
That's all you're getting.
 Today, at any rate. Not nearly drunk enough for the rest.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2287
text_en: I appreciate what you did share.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_2288
text_en: Next time, provide beer. Noted.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2289
text_en: Yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo3_2290
text_en: Heh. Won't say no to free beer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2296
text_en: Did you have family growing up?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2297
text_en: Like, brothers and sisters?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2298
text_en: Do you mean, did I have parents?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2299
text_en: No, I came from a test tube.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2304
text_en: There's a reason I don't like the Man in the Wall.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2305
text_en: Eleanor. She's driving me up the wall and I didn't know how much you'd understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2306
text_en: It... It wasn't pretty. Why're you asking?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2307
text_en: I had a sibling.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2308
text_en: Oh. Not technically? But all us kids on the Zariman were basically raised together.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2309
text_en: Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2310
text_en: Had?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2311
text_en: You know she and I are a "thing," right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2312
text_en: What's she doing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2313
text_en: She drives me nuts for a completely *different* reason. ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2314
text_en: I'm not a family therapist.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2315
text_en: AUGH. No. No, no, no! She's my SISTER!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2316
text_en: Don't you DARE!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2317
text_en: It's more about what she's not doing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2318
text_en: I'm not looking for gossip, mate. Or to start any nonsense.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2319
text_en: I'm just worried about her, is all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2320
text_en: Sorry, sorry, lol!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2321
text_en: That *tongue* though...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2322
text_en: She can invade my mind any time...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2323
text_en: I'm not comfortable with this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2324
text_en: What's the problem?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2325
text_en: IN ALL THE NAMES OF SOL, STOP.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2326
text_en: AUUUGH!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2360
text_en: But seriously, about your sister -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2327
text_en: I'm just teasing you, XD

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2328
text_en: *Sigh.* You have a sick sense of humour, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2329
text_en: I was left on my own too much.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2330
text_en: Right. Well, now that I've managed to scrub my brain down with bleach, it's more about what she's not doing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2331
text_en: It's a gift.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2332
text_en: Anyway. About Eleanor? Whats she doing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2333
text_en: There's an anniversary that we've...celebrated is the wrong word.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2336
text_en: This has been a... pretty messed up year, to be fair. Maybe she just forgot?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2334
text_en: Commiserated. Every year.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2335
text_en: And she missed it this year. She never does.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2337
text_en: Can I ask what you were supposed to be commiserating?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2338
text_en: It's not really my story to tell, it's hers.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2339
text_en: Have you just asked her about it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2340
text_en: Why not?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2341
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2342
text_en: Then why're you bothering me? Go ask *her* what's up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2343
text_en: Thanks for all the "advice," mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2344
text_en: We lost someone who was important to both of us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2345
text_en: She didn't forget.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2346
text_en: I... don't know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2347
text_en: I assume whatever this event that you're commiserating was painful.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2348
text_en: Well, I'm not your therapist. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2349
text_en: Maybe now that everything in your lives have changed, you want to let it go? Maybe she does, too?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2350
text_en: Have you talked to her about missing the date?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2351
text_en: Oh... I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2352
text_en: It happens.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2353
text_en: No. And I honestly couldn't tell you why. Instead, I'm here talking to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2354
text_en: Maybe. Maybe it is time to move on from the past. Which is ironic, considering your situation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2355
text_en: Eh, there's a difference between choosing to stay and being trapped. Trust me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2356
text_en: I like the view, what can I say?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2357
text_en: Heh. Well. Thanks, all the same.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo5_2358
text_en: You going to tell me what all this was about?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_2359
text_en: I will. Just... when I've had some time to think.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2361
text_en: Let's trade hostage facts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2362
text_en: LOL what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2363
text_en: The past is weird.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2364
text_en: Heh. So. This is a game I used to play in the Britannic Army.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2365
text_en: You tell me an embarrassing fact about yourself, and I tell you one about myself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2366
text_en: We hold each other's facts hostage.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2367
text_en: Hostage facts. It's a "trust exercise." I'll even go first.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2368
text_en: Normally, I think you're supposed to go to a ropes course... but fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2369
text_en: Sure. Why not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2370
text_en: Nah. I'm out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2371
text_en: Suit yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2372
text_en: ROFLMAO

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2373
text_en: Here's mine: I own a teddy bear named Sebastian.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2374
text_en: Now, before you get it in your head that I snuggle up with him at night, I don't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2375
text_en: I found him on a mission, in a bombed out housing block, years ago.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2376
text_en: I keep him on a shelf. And when I've got nobody else to talk to?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2377
text_en: I talk to him. Ratty old fella. Keeps me from going nuts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2378
text_en: That is... painfully adorable.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2379
text_en: Can I hug Sebastian at some point?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2380
text_en: Don't see why not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2381
text_en: I think I just died a little.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2382
text_en: You're full of surprises, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2383
text_en: I might pee I'm laughing so hard! lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2396
text_en: Yeah, yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2384
text_en: Yeah, I get it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2385
text_en: Heh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2386
text_en: Your turn.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2387
text_en: On Duviri, I kept accidentally summoning my childhood bedroom because I wanted somewhere to hide.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2388
text_en: One time, when I was decapitated by Lodun, my head flew off so hard it wound up in a tree!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2389
text_en: It took me six hundred and eighty-seven loops to learn how to properly ride a kaithe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2390
text_en: No, I'll pass. But thanks for telling me about Sebastian.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_3664
text_en: Should've known.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2391
text_en: I started tallying all my broken bones. I think I still have the list somewhere.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2392
text_en: Do you know how long the head stays alive after it's been cut off? Because *I DO.* LOL

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo6_2393
text_en: I've lost track of how many bedrooms I summoned by the time I figured out how to get out of there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2394
text_en: Dear Sol... I think you misunderstood the assignment here, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo6_2395
text_en: But, uh - thanks for trying.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2397
text_en: Hey, Drifter.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2398
text_en: What do you do for hobbies out there in space? In the future?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2399
text_en: Me? Specifically?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2400
text_en: What do you do for fun?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2401
text_en: Yes you, specifically.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2402
text_en: I'm asking you, first.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2403
text_en: Oops! There's a bee in here! BRB! [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2404
text_en: Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2405
text_en: I...um...not a lot.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2406
text_en: So sue me for showing a little interest in *you* for a change.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2407
text_en: Everybody's got something.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2408
text_en: Nothing. I died a lot. Thanks for reminding me. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2409
text_en: Well... reading. I did a lot of reading.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2410
text_en: The stories I kept in my head were the only things I was allowed to keep on Duviri.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2411
text_en: Everything else would disappear when it looped.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2412
text_en: And when I was alone on the Zariman, the people on the page were the only friends I had.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2413
text_en: Now? I play games with Ordis. And read. And... still keep to myself, really.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2414
text_en: Shit.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2415
text_en: So, hey. Look.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2416
text_en: I'm a pretty decent cook.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2417
text_en: TWO WORDS. SQUARE. SPAGHETTI.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2418
text_en: I ate the square spaghetti, Arthur. That is a LIE.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2419
text_en: LOOK. I said I was sorry!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2420
text_en: What I'm trying to say is - would you like to learn to cook? It's a great hobby.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2421
text_en: Pass. Thanks. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2422
text_en: Are you offering to loan me a book?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2423
text_en: No, daftie. I'm offering to teach you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2424
text_en: Um. Nah. I'm good.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2425
text_en: Oh! Yeah! I'd like that. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo1_2426
text_en: I'd love that. But can you wear one of those cute aprons? And.... maybe only the apron? ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2427
text_en: Suit yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2428
text_en: It's a plan, then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo1_2429
text_en: Heh. Don't push your luck.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2430
text_en: I'm worried about Eleanor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2431
text_en: She knows.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2432
text_en: I mean, that's your job as her brother.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2433
text_en: She can handle herself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2434
text_en: BRB [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2435
text_en: Try telling that to *her.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2436
text_en: I know she knows, that's the damn *problem.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2437
text_en: Sometimes, I'm not so sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2438
text_en: So?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2439
text_en: I'm...not following.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2446
text_en: I can see why that'd make things harder...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2440
text_en: How do you help someone who can see past your words?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2441
text_en: I just don't know how to help her anymore.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2447
text_en: Wouldn't that make it easier?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2442
text_en: I'm assuming you don't mean that literally.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2443
text_en: Okay, brb.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2444
text_en: Oh for f-- I didn't mean that bloody literally, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2445
text_en: No, I don't mean that bloody literally, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2448
text_en: When I need her to listen to reason, all she hears is *motives* and *feelings.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2449
text_en: We've always been on the same wavelength. Twins and all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2450
text_en: Listening to your intentions rather than your words.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2451
text_en: Maybe that's more honest, but...complicated. Harder to convince her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2452
text_en: How is that a bad thing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2453
text_en: Yikes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2454
text_en: You clearly haven't spent enough time talking to her, then. It's like she's got the bloody stage directions and I don't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2455
text_en: Exactly. It's like she's got the bloody stage directions and I don't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2456
text_en: It's one thing when you're twins and share a wavelength. It's another thing when she's literally *in* your thoughts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2457
text_en: Yeah, not gonna lie, it creeps me out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2458
text_en: Can I make a suggestion?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2459
text_en: I dunno, I think it's kinda hot.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2460
text_en: She can't help it. And right now, we're her only friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2461
text_en: Go for it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2462
text_en: She can invade my mind anytime... :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2463
text_en: AUGH

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2464
text_en: Have you tried telling her how hard it is to tell her how hard it is to tell her how you feel?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2465
text_en: Have you tried talking to her in this text app?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2466
text_en: She'll be fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_3659
text_en: I'm not so sure. I don't think any of us can understand what she's going through.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2467
text_en: Hard to read your mind that way. And sometimes it's easier to communicate in text. Case in point, look at us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2468
text_en: I...no. I didn't think of that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2469
text_en: I'm going to try that. Thank you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2470
text_en: Okay, that sounded a lot smarter in my head.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2471
text_en: I admit that did make me laugh, though.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2472
text_en: So, good job on at least cheering me up a bit.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2473
text_en: And I've tried that, but it doesn't work. She just shuts me out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2474
text_en: Hmm...have you tried texting her in the app?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2475
text_en: I'd trust her to know when she needs help. She'll come to you if she does.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2476
text_en: She's my sis. I can't just let her suffer. I'll think of something on my own.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2477
text_en: Sometimes it's easier to express yourself in text, anyway. Less pressure. Easier to think.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2478
text_en: And that's when your twin *can't* read your mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2479
text_en: And...now I feel like a total knobhead.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2480
text_en: I'll do that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2481
text_en: She's my SISTER you BLOODY PSYCHOPATH

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2482
text_en: Forget I started this damn conversation!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2483
text_en: She was born two minutes before me at a minute to midnight, and she thinks she's a hundred years wiser.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2484
text_en: She's hurting. And she's alone. And when she's like that...she goes dark.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2485
text_en: And I don't mean normal dark. "Crystals and cards and ghosts" dark. I mean *pit of the void* dark.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2486
text_en: And you're worried someday she won't come back?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2487
text_en: When I use Transference on Eleanor, I can hear what she hears. I don't blame her for having dark moments.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2488
text_en: I am. I can't lose her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2489
text_en: I didn't even think about that...of course you can.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2490
text_en: She's stronger than you give her credit for.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2491
text_en: I'll help keep an eye on her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2492
text_en: Trust me, I know how proper tough she is.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2493
text_en: Anybody even half an ounce less capable would've snapped in half by now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2494
text_en: This is a lot to adjust to--she'll be fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2495
text_en: Then trust her to come to you if she needs help.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2496
text_en: Maybe. But this is also something she's never had to deal with before.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2497
text_en: And I can't stand the idea of her dealing with this on her own.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2498
text_en: Have you told her *that* word for word?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2499
text_en: Some people want to deal with things on their own. Have you asked if she even *wants* help?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2500
text_en: ...No. I don't suppose as I have.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2501
text_en: Is she...okay?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2502
text_en: As okay as someone can be, when her friends treat her like a monster.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2503
text_en: As okay as she can be, when her own twin brother doesn't know how to talk to her anymore.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2504
text_en: She can hear every thought of everybody around her--and has to try to keep a straight face. I'd go dark now and again, too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2505
text_en: That is...very fair.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2506
text_en: ...Ouch.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2507
text_en: Deserved, but...ouch.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2508
text_en: Hard to be the outcast amongst freaks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2509
text_en: Consider what Quincy thinks about when he thinks nobody's paying attention.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2510
text_en: I'd really rather not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2511
text_en: But point taken.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2512
text_en: What should I do?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2513
text_en: I'd march up to her and give her a hug, personally. Let your emotions do the talking.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2514
text_en: Talk to her on here. Hard to read minds through text.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo2_2515
text_en: Just...be patient. If she needs you, she'll let you know. Some people need to heal on their own.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2516
text_en: Good idea. I'll try that. Thanks, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2517
text_en: Might be overdue for one of those. Thanks, friend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_2518
text_en: Fair point. Thanks, friend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurEleanor_2519
text_en: Hey. I took your advice about Eleanor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurEleanor_2520
text_en: How'd it go?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurEleanor_2521
text_en: You took advice? Are you feeling all right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurEleanor_2522
text_en: Brb. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurEleanor_2523
text_en: Better than I'd thought it would.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurEleanor_2524
text_en: Smartass.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurEleanor_2525
text_en: Turns out it was...a good idea, actually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurEleanor_2526
text_en: Sorry, can't help it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurEleanor_2527
text_en: It's a gift.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurEleanor_2528
text_en: Debatable.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurEleanor_2529
text_en: I just wanted to say thanks. It was a good idea.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurEleanor_2530
text_en: So...thanks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurEleanor_2531
text_en: Anytime. That's what friends are for.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurEleanor_2532
text_en: Maybe you should listen to me more often.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurEleanor_2533
text_en: Never mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2534
text_en: Any words of ad vice for someone string down ternity in a sodding time loop?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2535
text_en: Are you okay?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2536
text_en: No, I am nt bloody *okay.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2537
text_en: Where do I even start?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2538
text_en: Nope. I'm not doing this. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2539
text_en: W ell?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2540
text_en: Don't fragging patr

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2541
text_en: patronize me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2542
text_en: Wake up on the wrong side of the bed this morning?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2543
text_en: Okay! Okay, sorry. Sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2544
text_en: Bugger off. Never mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2545
text_en: Let's start with: How drunk are you right now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2546
text_en: Honestly, it's probably best not to think about.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2547
text_en: Ca n't   stop. Trid.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2548
text_en: Shit. I've been there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2549
text_en: You're a little messed up right now, aren't you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2550
text_en: Sod of, yu w anker.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2551
text_en: Not drnk.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2552
text_en: k mybe

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2553
text_en: Be honest.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2554
text_en: Can't say I blame you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2555
text_en: ok fine

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2556
text_en: You're sure you want to talk about this right now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2557
text_en: If Duviri had booze, I'd have done the same thing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2558
text_en: only way I feel up to tlking a bout it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2559
text_en: that's why I   you've been through this

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2560
text_en: i need to know about duviri. everything. I needto know what if felt like.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2561
text_en: wjat you went through

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2562
text_en: I kneed to know what's waiting for me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2563
text_en: Please.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2564
text_en: I know it's frightening.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2565
text_en: For a while, I pasted a joyful smile on my face and pretended it was fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2566
text_en: I was so envious of the people who weren't abandoned.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2567
text_en: I was just so damn *angry.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2568
text_en: It was so easy to give in to the sorrow.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2569
text_en: sod off I'm not scared

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2570
text_en: what? why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2571
text_en: the other tenno?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2572
text_en: at what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2573
text_en: sadness is a poison

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2574
text_en: I'm not insulting you, that's just a *fact.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2575
text_en: Because fake happiness was better than anything else.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2576
text_en: Hell, even our dead parents. Anybody. Anybody who wasn't *me.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2577
text_en: Not what. *Who.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2578
text_en: Exactly. It eats you. Dissolves you. Leaves you broken and hollow.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2579
text_en: This shit is *horrifying.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2580
text_en: Because if I let that smile slide, then *everything else* would creep in.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2581
text_en: Because then I wouldn't have to deal with the pain. The loneliness.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2582
text_en: Angry at the ones who weren't abandoned. Angry at my parents. Angry at the Orokin.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2583
text_en: Takes away all color from the world. But it's also... safe. Simple. Easy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2584
text_en: And fear leaks into everything else. And it starts  to make you lash out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2585
text_en: The pain. The loneliness.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2586
text_en: The fact that I was trapped *forever.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2587
text_en: Angry at everyone, it didn't matter. Angry at everyone because. It. Was. Their. Fault.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2588
text_en: Like a warm, cozy blanket long gone cold.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2589
text_en: It turns into pain. Into agony. And then it turns into loneliness.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2590
text_en: The joy was just a cheap facade.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2591
text_en: I wanted to be anyone else. Anywhere else. So very badly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2592
text_en: And most importantly? Furious at myself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2593
text_en: It's an easy thing to clutch to in the darkness.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2594
text_en: But when all that fades away, something else takes over.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2595
text_en: Something worse. Something more insidious.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2596
text_en: Something that worms its way into you and eats you whole.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2597
text_en: Apathy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2598
text_en: bollocks

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2599
text_en: after everything yu told me you went through?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2600
text_en: apathy can't be worse than that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2601
text_en: apathy sonds like the only way to stay sane

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2602
text_en: I thought so, too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2603
text_en: But at what price?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2604
text_en: Trust me. It is.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2605
text_en: Don't wish away your feelings.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2606
text_en: But don't let go of what you feel. Not now, not ever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2607
text_en: Don't let go of what you feel. Not now, not ever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2608
text_en: It's what makes us human.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2609
text_en: Not our bodies, not whether or not we can be Transferred into or whatever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2610
text_en: It's emotions. All of them. The good and the bad.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2611
text_en: Fear. Joy. Anger. Envy. Sorrow. Even a little apathy now and then is fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2612
text_en: Don't ever, *ever* give them up, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2613
text_en: Feel everything. Every second of it. That's how you survive this. And you have something I never did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2614
text_en: waht?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2615
text_en: Friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2616
text_en: Family.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2617
text_en: Me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2618
text_en: You're surrounded by six people who care about you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2619
text_en: You're surrounded by six people who believe in you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2620
text_en: You aren't alone. I'm here with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2621
text_en: Who are going through the same thing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2622
text_en: And we can carry each other when we need it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2623
text_en: i... oh. im way too drunk not to tyep something stupid.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2624
text_en: we shoudl stop now, but...rain check.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2625
text_en: i... ur right

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2626
text_en: shit, i need to go lie down. you're right. i'm too drunk for this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2627
text_en: an drifter? seriously, thanks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2628
text_en: Anytime, A.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo3_2629
text_en: Get some rest.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2630
text_en: night

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo3_2631
text_en: good advice

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2632
text_en: Drifter.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2633
text_en: I am already regretting this...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2634
text_en: What's up, Petersham?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2635
text_en: What's up, James?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2636
text_en: Sup?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2637
text_en: Yeah, man?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2638
text_en: Couldn't help it, sorry. :P You were saying?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2639
text_en: Heh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2640
text_en: You've been patient enough with me. If you still want that story of why I left the Brittanic army... I probably owe it to you twice by now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2641
text_en: If you're sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2642
text_en: I'm all ears.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2643
text_en: No, thanks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2644
text_en: I'm sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2645
text_en: Everybody joins the army for a different reason. For me, I joined for... honor. For purpose.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2646
text_en: I wanted to be a hero, like a Sol-damned fool.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2647
text_en: Point being, I went in with big, grandiose ideas of what it meant to be a Soldier.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2648
text_en: To protect Prince and Principality.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2649
text_en: But I learned how much of a lie that really was.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2650
text_en: What happened?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2651
text_en: Oh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2652
text_en: I have to go. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2653
text_en: Your role as a soldier isn't to THINK. It's to follow orders.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2654
text_en: No matter what.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2655
text_en: So, when I got sent in behind contested lines and told to kill all "potential enemy combatants"?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2656
text_en: I did what a good soldier does. I followed orders.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2657
text_en: I think I can see where this is going...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2658
text_en: Oh no...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2659
text_en: Doesn't take a genius.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2660
text_en: Yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2661
text_en: I don't know how many innocent lives we put in the ground that day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2662
text_en: But it was too many.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2663
text_en: When I went around demanding answers to why we'd just slaughtered innocents, the Brass threatened me with a dishonorable discharge.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2664
text_en: Shut up. Do your job. Shoot your gun. Kill like a good soldier.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2665
text_en: Don't. Ask. Questions.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2666
text_en: They were right. I shouldn't have been asking questions. I'm shit at getting to the bottom of things.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2667
text_en: But -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2668
text_en: Arthur...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2669
text_en: No, let me finish. I'M shit at getting to the bottom of a mystery. But you know who isn't?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2670
text_en: And who worked as a Journo? And had connections to every major paper at the time?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2671
text_en: So the deal was simple. Let me out on early retirement or the lid gets blown wide open. I wasn't important enough for them to care. They let me walk without a fuss after that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2672
text_en: So you joined the ICR after that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2673
text_en: It wasn't your fault, what happened.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2674
text_en: I did. And fell into exactly the same nave trap. I trusted leadership to care about civvies.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2675
text_en: If I had a pound for every time Eleanor's said that to me...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2676
text_en: Murder all possible infested innocents, no matter if it's true or not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2677
text_en: Have you ever tried listening to her?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2678
text_en: Ooh, we could afford to put in a hot tub!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2679
text_en: I just...couldn't. And neither could the rest of the Hex. And so - here we are.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2680
text_en: I'm sorry you've had to go through all this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2681
text_en: Doing the right thing is always the hardest choice.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2682
text_en: Now you really are starting to sound like her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2683
text_en: HAH.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2684
text_en: Sigh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2685
text_en: The thing with twins, is that no matter how far away you get from them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2686
text_en: Thanks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2687
text_en: Print that on a mug...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2688
text_en: They're still right there with you. Even when you're three thousand miles away behind enemy lines.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2689
text_en: They find a way to weave their way into your lives.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2690
text_en: I'll be all right. I always am.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2691
text_en: Are you okay?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2692
text_en: Is there something else you're not telling me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2693
text_en: Always.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2694
text_en: You don't have to be okay.
