name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2695
text_en: Um... bullshit?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2696
text_en: Story for another time?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo4_2697
text_en: Do you... want to talk about it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2698
text_en: I appreciate that. It's a rough story. And one for another day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2699
text_en: Heh. You're right. That was bullshit. But it's a story for another day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2700
text_en: Yeah, mate. Sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_2701
text_en: No. Not right now. Sorry..

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2702
text_en: Answer me something, Drifter.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2703
text_en: All right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2704
text_en: No. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2705
text_en: You're free. You can leave. Go anywhere. Anywhere but *here.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2706
text_en: We're the past. Dead and gone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2707
text_en: Just pieces of a memory or bits of data in one of Amir's games.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2708
text_en: We don't matter anymore. And maybe we never did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2709
text_en: So I gotta know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2710
text_en: Why would you ever keep coming back, when you had the choice to leave?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2711
text_en: For you. For us. For what we have.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2712
text_en: I don't have time for this. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2713
text_en: I feel special here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2714
text_en: The pizza is great. So, I like the food?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2715
text_en: If you'd prefer I leave, then just tell me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2716
text_en: The pizza is great. So, I like the food?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2717
text_en: Oh for Sol's sake...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2718
text_en: Square spaghetti not withstanding... ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2719
text_en: Love, I'm being serious.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2720
text_en: Do you think I'm just here with you, what, killing time?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2721
text_en: Arthur. I *care* about you. I care about all the of the Hex, but you most of all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2722
text_en: So of *course* I stay here with you!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2723
text_en: How can you even ask me that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2724
text_en: Only important person in a world of might-as-well-be-corpses? Charming.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2725
text_en: Don't put words in my mouth.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2726
text_en: Then what *did* you mean?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2727
text_en: That's not what I meant.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2728
text_en: You got that right. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2729
text_en: Square spaghetti not withstanding...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2730
text_en: Sol's sake, let that go! And don't change the subject.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2731
text_en: You can do better than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2732
text_en: I'm sorry I want to be your friend?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2733
text_en: Why're you so angry at me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2734
text_en: I like it here. End of story. End of conversation. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2735
text_en: You have something I never have. Freedom.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2736
text_en: Or are we like pets to you? Some sort of sideshow attraction maybe?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2737
text_en: So what is it? Pity? Or are you stupid as well as crazy?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2738
text_en: So I can't leave you behind. This place. This time. With *you?*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2739
text_en: It's the first place that's ever...felt like home.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2740
text_en: But it's not a serious question. How could you ask me that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2741
text_en: It's obvious why I'm here. For *you.* For the Hex. Because you're my family.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2742
text_en: Because you matter to me more than I can put into words.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2743
text_en: So, no. This place, this time? With *you,* Arthur? This is my home.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2744
text_en: Stop dodging! Why. Are. You. Still. Here?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2745
text_en: I keep coming back because I...have feelings for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2746
text_en: Because I have feelings for you, you ASSHAT.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2747
text_en: You want to know why?! Because you're the first FAMILY I've ever had!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2748
text_en: I'm done with this. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2749
text_en: Because despite the fact it didn't work out between us, I still *care* about you and the rest of the Hex like family.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2750
text_en: Because I still have feelings for you, that's why!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2758
text_en: And that's a "no thanks." Great.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_3483
text_en: How much I meant to you. And that's on me. C'mon. Let's go get a drink.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2751
text_en: I... sometimes try to find enemies where there aren't any. And I... didn't realize how much we meant to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2752
text_en: I owe you a pint, love. And one of those pizzas.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2753
text_en: It isn't sad.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2754
text_en: Okay, it's a little sad.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2755
text_en: But I owe you an apology, love... And a pint.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2756
text_en: I... sometimes try to find enemies where there aren't any. And I... didn't realize how much we meant to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2757
text_en: How much I meant to you. And that's on me. C'mon. Let's go get a drink.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2761
text_en: Oh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2762
text_en: Oh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2763
text_en: Shit.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2764
text_en: I've got to go think for a bit.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2765
text_en: That's all you've got to say?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2766
text_en: No - I mean - I need to go think. I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2767
text_en: How can you be telling me this, while you're stringing someone else along?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2768
text_en: If caring makes me crazy, or stupid, so be it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2769
text_en: That's why I keep coming back. Because that's what family *does.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2771
text_en: My temper's always been my worst enemy. Let me make it up to you over a pint?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2772
text_en: Go sit and spin, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo1_2773
text_en: Sure. You're forgiven. This time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2774
text_en: Yep, sounds just like family to me...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2775
text_en: Thanks, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2776
text_en: Rich.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2778
text_en: Real rich.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2779
text_en: After what you've pulled? That won't work on me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2780
text_en: Not anymore.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2781
text_en: Sod off.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2782
text_en: That's flattering...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2783
text_en: But if you want to give this another go, we should talk this though in person.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2784
text_en: If you don't tell Eleanor soon, she'll find out on her own.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2785
text_en: For your own safety I'd recommend telling her. But just so you know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2786
text_en: I accepted you leaving me for the better twin, but... this? There'll be no taking you back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2787
text_en: You need to tell Amir. It's not fair to him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2788
text_en: He's got enough to cope with as it is without dealing with your games.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2789
text_en: Do you know how rare it is for Quincy to trust someone? To really let someone in?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2790
text_en: You're proving all his worst suspicions about the world right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2791
text_en: Lettie's supposed to be with someone who helps share the burden.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2792
text_en: Not bloody add to to the pain.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2793
text_en: Aoi deserves better than you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2794
text_en: You failed her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo1_2795
text_en: Deplorable.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2796
text_en: Hey Drifter, I've been thinking.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2797
text_en: Yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2798
text_en: Uh oh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2799
text_en: I thought I smelled smoke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2800
text_en: Busy. Can't talk right now. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2801
text_en: Hah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2802
text_en: No, nothing bad this time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2803
text_en: I wanted to ask you something.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2804
text_en: Go for it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2805
text_en: Maybe later? [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2806
text_en: Ok.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2807
text_en: All those times you've flirted with me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2808
text_en: Were they just cheap lines?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2809
text_en: Shit you said for a lark?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2818
text_en: Because...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2812
text_en: Or did you mean it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2813
text_en: No, I was just playing around. :/

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2814
text_en: Thanks for the honesty.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2815
text_en: I mean...yeah. Have you *seen* yourself?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2816
text_en: Is it all just good looks to you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2817
text_en: Yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2819
text_en: No...sorry. That's just a shield. The truth is, I honestly can't stop thinking about you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2820
text_en: Then I suggest you spend your time talking to Quincy instead.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2821
text_en: Honestly? I... can't stop thinking about you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2822
text_en: This is making me uncomfortable. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2823
text_en: If you're messing with me, I'll break both your damn ankles.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2824
text_en: Good.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2825
text_en: I swear I'm not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2826
text_en: Hahah sorry! Yeah, it's just how we joke around in the future. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2827
text_en: The future has a sick sense of humour.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2828
text_en: It's mutual.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2829
text_en: Seriously?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2830
text_en: :D :D :D

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2831
text_en: You just threatened to break my ankles!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2832
text_en: I know I'm a tough read. I just...had to be sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2833
text_en: Three emoteethingies must mean something good.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2834
text_en: I never said I was always fun to put up with.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2835
text_en: Look.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2836
text_en: Emoticons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2837
text_en: You are so adorable.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2838
text_en: Anyway.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2839
text_en: Yeah, yeah. So, fair warning.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2840
text_en: Relationships with men like me aren't easy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2841
text_en: For a long time, I considered myself already dead.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2842
text_en: And when I became infected, even more so.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2843
text_en: But when I met you? I don't know. I felt, for the first time, like I really had someone who I could share the weight with.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2844
text_en: I felt like I could shut my eyes for even just a moment and everything would be okay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2845
text_en: With you here, I can breathe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2846
text_en: Hell no. [Do not date Arthur.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2847
text_en: And I...find myself smiling more. Laughing more.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2848
text_en: And I have you to thank for it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2849
text_en: So. I was wondering.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2850
text_en: Would you like to make a go at this? You and I?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2851
text_en: Are you... asking to date me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2852
text_en: Yes, you utter berk. What did you think I was asking you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2853
text_en: Sorry, sometimes I need help translating wherever-the-hell-you're-from.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2854
text_en: I just didn't believe you'd put your foot in your mouth like that. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2855
text_en: Thank you for reminding me why I don't bother with things like this anymore.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2856
text_en: Maybe someday I'll take you there. You'd love it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2857
text_en: And about my question. You and I. What do you think? Want to "date?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2858
text_en: I'd...love nothing more. [Date Arthur.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2859
text_en: I'm sorry. I'm not ready for this. [Do not date Arthur.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2860
text_en: You could've just told a man no, for Sol's sake.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2861
text_en: I respect that. No hard feelings. Let me know if you change your mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2862
text_en: This is going to take some getting used to, but...what's life without a bit of risk?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2863
text_en: Though I feel like the others won't let me hear the end of this. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2864
text_en: Did... did you just use an emoticon...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2865
text_en: They really are going to gossip.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2866
text_en: I believe I did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2867
text_en: Someone go get Lettie!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2868
text_en: I'm weirdly and sincerely flattered.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2869
text_en: Don't make me regret this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo3_2870
text_en: You laughed. You know you did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2872
text_en: *Anyway.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2873
text_en: I don't quite know what to say.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2876
text_en: You know what? Let them. It'll give them something to do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2874
text_en: Except that for the first time in a long time, I think I'm happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo3_2875
text_en: Thanks, Sweets.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2877
text_en: Sweets, can I ask you something?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2878
text_en: Of course.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2879
text_en: Can we chat later? [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2880
text_en: Everything you've told me of the future...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2881
text_en: Entrati.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2882
text_en: The Man in the Wall.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2883
text_en: The Sentients.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2884
text_en: Tau.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2885
text_en: Someday - and someday soon, I feel like the future will need you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2886
text_en: What're you trying to say?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2887
text_en: I gtg. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2888
text_en: Are you telling me to leave?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2889
text_en: I'm saying that sooner or later, you're going to go home and leave us here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2890
text_en: No. I'm saying that I feel like it's inevitable. Someday you *will* leave.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2891
text_en: Travel isn't permanent. I can come and go.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2892
text_en: Screw the future. I never belonged there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2893
text_en: Right. And someday you'll walk through that portal and never come back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2894
text_en: Are you telling me that if "The Lotus" came calling, you wouldn't go running?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2895
text_en: You wouldn't charge off to save the universe again?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2896
text_en: Why're you so angry with me for no reason?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2897
text_en: Says who?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2898
text_en: This is a valid concern.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2899
text_en: Says common sense.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2900
text_en: Common sense? Or fear?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2901
text_en: This is asinine. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2902
text_en: I don't want to leave, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2903
text_en: I'm not afraid. I was fine before you. I'll be fine after you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2921
text_en: So why are you pushing me away?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2904
text_en: Either you get sick of us and leave, or something horrible happens.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2905
text_en: Something horrible?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2906
text_en: Thanks for the vote of confidence...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2907
text_en: I repeat: Why are you angry at me for no reason?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2908
text_en: I'm being serious.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2909
text_en: I'm not having an argument with you over something that isn't real. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2910
text_en: No, you're not. You're looking for an excuse.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2911
text_en: You want a reason to push me away. You want a reason to not have to *care.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2912
text_en: People die. People disappear. That's called *life.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2913
text_en: It happens to anyone, at any time. Nothing is ever certain.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2914
text_en: Whether or not they're freaks or from the future or not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2915
text_en: So stop making *excuses* and tell me what's *really* bothering you, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2916
text_en: So, what's the problem, exactly?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2917
text_en: Since I clearly don't matter to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2918
text_en: That's not what I meant.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2919
text_en: Do you want me to leave? Or stay?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2920
text_en: What *did* you mean?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3655
text_en: First thing's first. You matter to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2922
text_en: I want you to stay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3656
text_en: You might die in the future, and I'd...never know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2923
text_en: And I'm...worried someday you'll leave and...never come back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2924
text_en: I just...I have this recurring nightmare of you...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2925
text_en: I'm not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2926
text_en: LOL

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2927
text_en: Then what the *hell* do you call this?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2931
text_en: I'm being serious.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2928
text_en: This is called an adult conversation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2929
text_en: Hey look on the bright side, you'll be the best Excalibur again if I go.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2930
text_en: Oh, *sod off.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2932
text_en: No, this is called you looking for excuses.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2933
text_en: I don't have any plans to leave. And that's the best I can do right now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2934
text_en: You could disappear at any time. You could get sick of us or die. And I'd never know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2935
text_en: And that's supposed to be enough?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2936
text_en: Yeah. And it should be enough.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2937
text_en: You don't want to get hurt, and I understand that. I respect that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2938
text_en: Stop looking for excuses.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2939
text_en: So do you want me to stay? Or leave?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2940
text_en: I...don't know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2941
text_en: Because I might be from the future, but I can't predict it, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2942
text_en: I don't know what the future holds for us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2943
text_en: But right now? I want to be here with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2944
text_en: But people disappear all the time. Normal people.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2945
text_en: People die all the time. Normal people.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2946
text_en: You don't have to be a freak or from the future for that to happen.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2947
text_en: I think you don't want to get hurt.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2948
text_en: Let me know when you figure it out. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2949
text_en: Can you blame me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2950
text_en: Of course not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2951
text_en: That doesn't mean I'm going to intentionally disappear.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2952
text_en: Intentionally.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2953
text_en: But I think you need to figure out if you're okay with this relationship.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2954
text_en: Because yeah. Someday, something MIGHT happen.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2955
text_en: Something might happen. I can't promise otherwise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2956
text_en: That's called life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2957
text_en: So stop searching for reasons to push me away.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2958
text_en: If you want this to end, just end it. Don't blame it on me someday "disappearing."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2959
text_en: No...sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2960
text_en: You're right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2961
text_en: Sometimes, people don't come back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2962
text_en: I don't deal well when I'm the one trapped in the past and you're the one rushing off into battle to save the world.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2963
text_en: No kidding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2964
text_en: I'd feel the same in your shoes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2965
text_en: The future's in good hands. They don't need me. This place does.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2966
text_en: I...yeah. I'm sorry. I'd have to go, if the universe was at stake.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2967
text_en: We need your help with what? Viktor Vodiyanoi? Please.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2968
text_en: I've seen what the future's up against.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2969
text_en: I can handle some Techrot and some overzealous military goons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2970
text_en: Fine. Then the truth is? Ironically, I can't predict the future.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2971
text_en: I don't want to leave. So what do you want me to say?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2972
text_en: Then I'll ask again. If you get pulled away: would you come back?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2973
text_en: I don't know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2974
text_en: After this conversation? I'm thinking not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2975
text_en: If I could, of course. Why would you assume otherwise?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2976
text_en: Well, better we end this now, rather than later, I suppose.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2977
text_en: Too much time expecting the worst of people.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2978
text_en: I'm jumping at shadows.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2979
text_en: I just keep...having this nightmare, where you're gone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2980
text_en: Where I couldn't save you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2981
text_en: And... I can't stand the thought of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2982
text_en: I...don't think anybody's ever worried about *me* before.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2983
text_en: Remember, *I'm* the better fighter, here. I don't need saving.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2984
text_en: Yeah. Screw me for caring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2985
text_en: That might be the...sweetest thing I've ever heard.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2986
text_en: Not that you're worried about me--I don't want that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2987
text_en: All right, let's start over. Can you tell me what's really bothering you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2988
text_en: Well, let me know when you figure it out. I'm done with this conversation. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2989
text_en: But that you *care.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2990
text_en: I can't promise I'll always make it back alive.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2991
text_en: But I can promise I'll fight tooth and nail every single time to do so.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2992
text_en: That's the most a soldier - and a man - can ask for. Thanks, sweets.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2993
text_en: Honesty. Thank you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2994
text_en: Would you come back?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2995
text_en: I would fight tooth and nail to make it back to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2996
text_en: Meh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2997
text_en: Well. Better to find out this was a mistake *now* rather than *later.* I'm ending this between us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_2998
text_en: My home is here, with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_2999
text_en: But you're a soldier, like me. And sometimes soldiers don't come home.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_3000
text_en: Yeah. And that's just...how it goes, sometimes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_3001
text_en: The good news is, I'm really hard to kill.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3002
text_en: I'll hold onto the dream of retirement.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3003
text_en: Heh. Yeah. I know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3004
text_en: I suppose it's hard to ever know how much time we have.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3005
text_en: Best to just...cherish what we've got.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3006
text_en: Laying in a puddle of blood on some distant planet, killed by some...alien robot, or mutated...whatever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3007
text_en: And I wouldn't have been there to save you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3008
text_en: And before you claim "I promise I won't go," you're lying.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3009
text_en: Because I know you. And I know if you get that call, you're going. You'll do the right thing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3010
text_en: That's who you are.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3011
text_en: But the idea of it doesn't scare me. I'm not lying about that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3012
text_en: Because whatever the thought of you dying does to me, it's somehow far, far worse than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3013
text_en: I don't even know if it has a name.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_3014
text_en: Then I vow I will always fight tooth and nail to come back to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_3015
text_en: I...don't know what to say.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_3016
text_en: I can't do this to you. I can't. We need to end this now. [Break up with Arthur.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo4_3657
text_en: I promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_3652
text_en: Oh? Why not?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3017
text_en: I...yeah. You're right. This is for the best.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3018
text_en: Just tell me you'll try not to die out there. Or at least take me with you if you ever find a way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo4_3658
text_en: That's the most I can ask for. And maybe take me with you if you ever find a way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3019
text_en: I've never been called an "asshat" before.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3020
text_en: I've got more where that came from.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3021
text_en: First time for everything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3022
text_en: Sorry about that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3023
text_en: Still mad. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3024
text_en: I'm sure I'll hear all your clever insults eventually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3025
text_en: I thought I'd experienced most of the world, until I met you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3026
text_en: Nah. I've been called worse.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3027
text_en: So.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3028
text_en: About what you said.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3029
text_en: That whole "I have feelings for you" thing? It was a joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3031
text_en: Seriously?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3032
text_en: I have a sick sense of humor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3033
text_en: I-- wait. Sorry. No. I meant it. Go on.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3034
text_en: I...owe you an explanation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3035
text_en: When I joined the ICR - even before then, I was a military man.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3036
text_en: I've lived my entire life with one foot in the grave. I've always been as good as dead.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3037
text_en: And it's never been more true than now. Look at me. I mean *look at me.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3038
text_en: I'm not even *human.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3039
text_en: So...we've had a chance to get to know each other. We've grown a bit close, yeah? You...make me laugh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3040
text_en: You make me smile more than I have in years.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3041
text_en: But how can you want to be with someone...like me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3042
text_en: Arthur, you mean more to me than you can imagine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3043
text_en: I'm not ready for this. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3044
text_en: I have a thing for toaster ovens?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3045
text_en: Let me know if you change your mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3046
text_en: And you've instantly made me regret this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3047
text_en: Of everything that's happened in this cursed year, I never dreamed...never even imagined...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3048
text_en: I don't care "what's happened to you."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3049
text_en: You're *you.* And that's what I'm here for. And that's who I want to be with.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3050
text_en: You. Arthur Nightingale.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3051
text_en: You really want to try this? Us?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3052
text_en: Yeah. I do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAsshat_3053
text_en: Maybe not yet? Can we take more time? [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3054
text_en: That's probably wise. Good call.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3055
text_en: Screw it. Let's do this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAsshat_3056
text_en: What could possibly go wrong?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3057
text_en: Hey, love. Is now finally a good time to talk about Duviri?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3058
text_en: Hey, Drifter. Is now finally a good time to talk about Duviri?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3059
text_en: You better thank the Void every damn day you wake up that you're so damn cute.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3060
text_en: I'm not the begging type, but... I might to avoid this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3061
text_en: I suppose I've dodged this long enough.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3062
text_en: There's never a good time. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3063
text_en: I prefer "ruggedly handsome," but I'll take it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3064
text_en: I'm almost tempted. Almost.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3065
text_en: I know it's a rough topic, but...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3066
text_en: I ask you enough about your past. It's only fair, I guess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3067
text_en: Yeah... yeah. It's time. You deserve to know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3068
text_en: If it finally gets you off my back about it, great.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3069
text_en: That means a lot, love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3070
text_en: That means a lot.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3071
text_en: I care about you. Deeply. And that's why I'm trying to learn the truth about this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3072
text_en: You and I have been through a lifetime of madness in the relatively short time we've known each other.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3073
text_en: It isn't to learn some dark terrible secret.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3074
text_en: And I care about you as a dear, dear friend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3075
text_en: It's because I see you hurting. I see you hiding. And it isn't like you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3076
text_en: It's because I see you hurting. I see you hiding. And it isn't like you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3077
text_en: And I want to help you. Thank you for letting me try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3078
text_en: And I want to help you. Thank you for letting me try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3079
text_en: You "guess?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3080
text_en: This isn't about fairness.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3081
text_en: Love, last I checked, this is the kind of thing people in a relationship are meant to know about each other.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3082
text_en: This is about the fact that something about that place is eating away at you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3083
text_en: Something about that place eats away at you. And I care about you - deeply. I'm not going to let you just wallow in pain.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3084
text_en: You and I have been through a lifetime of madness in the relatively short time we've known each other.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3085
text_en: Let me help you. That's what I'm sodding *here* for.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3086
text_en: And you're someone I consider a dear, dear friend. I want to help you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3087
text_en: Hah. That's how you're going to play this?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3088
text_en: You've been up my ass about Duviri this whole time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3089
text_en: Yeah, well, you don't like talking about YOUR dirty laundry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3090
text_en: Love, we're together. We're supposed to know these things about each other.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3091
text_en: That's what this is about, isn't it? Finding my weak spot? Finding what's *wrong* with me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3092
text_en: Pardon me for being curious about the bloody *alternate reality* you come from.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3093
text_en: You come from an *alternate reality.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3094
text_en: Dirty laundry?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3095
text_en: Kind of a wild thing for a bloke to wrap his head around.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3096
text_en: Kind of a wild thing for a bloke to wrap his head around.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3097
text_en: "Oh, yeah, I come from a storybook world with dragons that kept murdering me. Where're you from?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3098
text_en: "Oh, yeah, I come from a storybook world with dragons that kept murdering me. Where're you from?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3099
text_en: It's a normal thing for somebody to want to ask questions about, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3100
text_en: It's a normal thing for somebody to want to ask questions about, let alone of somebody they're dating.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3101
text_en: Why do you think I've been avoiding this conversation for so long, Arthur?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3102
text_en: I'm not doing this. I just can't. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3103
text_en: You think this is about power?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3104
text_en: You think that's what this is about, love...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3105
text_en: Finding a crack in the armor to attack? Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3106
text_en: Me, trying to find a crack in the armor, for... what reason?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3107
text_en: I don't bloody know, love. That's what I've been trying to figure out!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3108
text_en: That's what I've been trying to figure out!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3109
text_en: What've *you* possibly got to be ashamed of?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3110
text_en: Because I'm ashamed of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3111
text_en: Because it hurts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3112
text_en: Because I hate everything about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3113
text_en: Everybody has pain. And you're too strong to run from it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3114
text_en: Hating what made you is so often shorthand for hating yourself, if left unaddressed.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3115
text_en: So I won't accept that. Look at you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3116
text_en: You blasted in here and steamrolled the Scaldra like it was nothing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3117
text_en: You keep the Techrot at bay without breaking a sweat.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3118
text_en: You won our trust. And my heart.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3119
text_en: You won our trust.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3120
text_en: Shit, don't make me cry, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3121
text_en: Wherever you came from, it made you a force of nature.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3122
text_en: One I'm honoured to stand beside.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3123
text_en: Well, if you do, I'll make sure to make it up to you later...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3124
text_en: Yeah, but once you know, I'm afraid that might change.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3125
text_en: Yeah, but once you know, I'm afraid that might change.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3126
text_en: I'm sorry. I can't do this. I just can't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3127
text_en: I know. But that fear is in your head.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3128
text_en: I know. But that fear is in your head.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3129
text_en: Fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3130
text_en: Promise?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3132
text_en: For how little time we've spent together, you and I have been through a lifetime's worth of nonsense.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3133
text_en: Promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3134
text_en: That's a new one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3135
text_en: Now. Don't change the subject.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3136
text_en: Do you trust me, love?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3137
text_en: Yeah. I do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3138
text_en: I... I just can't do this, I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3139
text_en: Sigh. All right. Then, I think it's best if we take some time off.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3140
text_en: Think it over.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3141
text_en: I'd trust you with my life, Drifter. Sol knows I already have on more than one occasion.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3142
text_en: Question is, do you trust me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3143
text_en: Yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3144
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3145
text_en: Then that's that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3146
text_en: To end it with me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3147
text_en: To make yourself look good with the others. Bring me down a peg.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3148
text_en: I haven't slept better in years since you arrived. Since all this madness went down.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3149
text_en: So stop swinging at shadows.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3150
text_en: You think I'm looking for reasons to break up with you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3151
text_en: If I wanted to end it, I'd just *end it,* love. I'm not the type to play mind games.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3152
text_en: Something tells me I'm not the one you're fighting, love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3153
text_en: Tell me you think better of me than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3154
text_en: Good. Apology accepted. But I'm worried, love. You're lashing out like a wounded animal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3155
text_en: I... yeah, I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3156
text_en: Honestly? I'm not so sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3157
text_en: Well. If you're looking to give me a reason to end things, you just found it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3158
text_en: And that's not like you. I see someone I care deeply about in pain, and I want to help you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3159
text_en: I'm going to cut you some slack. This is clearly a rough subject for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3160
text_en: What're you afraid of?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3161
text_en: So, love. Either lay it out on the table for me, talk me through what you're clearly so afraid of -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3162
text_en: Or we walk away from this. This just became about trust.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3163
text_en: I'm sorry. I can't do this. I just can't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3666
text_en: Sigh. All right. Then, I think it's best if we take some time off.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3667
text_en: Think it over.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3164
text_en: I watched you fall out of the mouth of some giant slime monster.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3165
text_en: That once you learn the truth, you'll... be disgusted by me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3166
text_en: And we're still dating.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3167
text_en: It takes a lot to disgust me, love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3168
text_en: But it all comes down to one simple question. Do. You. Trust. Me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3169
text_en: That once you learn the truth, you won't respect me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3170
text_en: I'm sorry. I can't do this. I just can't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3171
text_en: We all have darkness that follows us. In our past, in our minds...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3172
text_en: All right. Then neither can I. I'm sorry, we're done.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3173
text_en: Sol knows I have plenty.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3174
text_en: Weakness isn't about having the darkness, it's about hiding from it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3175
text_en: Then that's that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3176
text_en: Yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3177
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3178
text_en: To make yourself look good with the others. Bring me down a peg.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3179
text_en: I don't know. Blackmail?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3180
text_en: You're grasping at straws.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3181
text_en: I haven't slept better in years since you arrived. Since all this madness went down.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3182
text_en: So stop swinging at shadows.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3183
text_en: Something tells me I'm not the one you're fighting here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3184
text_en: Yeah... I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3185
text_en: I dunno. You seem to be itching for a fight.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3186
text_en: Good. Apology accepted.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3187
text_en: I'm always happy to go a few rounds in the ring. But believe it or not, this isn't one of those times.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3188
text_en: I see somebody I care about in pain. A friend in need.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3189
text_en: And you're lashing out at me like a wounded animal. And I want to know why.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3190
text_en: What're you afraid of?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3191
text_en: That once you learn the truth, you'll... be disgusted by me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3192
text_en: That once you learn the truth, you won't respect me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3193
text_en: I'm sorry. I can't do this. I just can't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3194
text_en: I watched you fall out of the mouth of some giant slime monster.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3195
text_en: We all have darkness that follows us. In our past, in our minds...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3196
text_en: Fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3197
text_en: Sol knows I have plenty.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3198
text_en: You've seen Eleanor's tongue.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3199
text_en: It takes a lot to disgust me, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3200
text_en: Weakness isn't about having the darkness, it's about hiding from it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3201
text_en: But it all comes down to one simple question. Do. You. Trust. Me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3202
text_en: Yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3203
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3204
text_en: Then that's that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3205
text_en: You don't get it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3206
text_en: Orowyrms. Not dragons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3207
text_en: This is me, TRYING to get it!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3208
text_en: SAME BLOODY THING.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3209
text_en: Throw me a sodding bone, will you?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3210
text_en: Duviri is messed up, Arthur. Really messed up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3211
text_en: STOP DEFLECTING.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3212
text_en: Whatever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3213
text_en: That's what I'm trying to get at here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3214
text_en: Sol knows I have the patience of a mountain, dealing with attitude problems.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3215
text_en: Whatever you think happened in Duviri?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3216
text_en: But this is getting real close to the line.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3217
text_en: It's worse than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3218
text_en: Drifter, I'm worried about you. This isn't like you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3219
text_en: Can you trust me enough to tell me how?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3220
text_en: I see a friend lashing out like a wounded animal. Someone I care deeply about.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3221
text_en: Please tell me why.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3222
text_en: Orowyrms. Not dragons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3223
text_en: You don't get it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3224
text_en: They're the same bloody thing!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3225
text_en: I'm doing my bloody damndest to meet you halfway here!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3226
text_en: Stop deflecting!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3227
text_en: Love, I'm worried about you. This isn't like you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3228
text_en: You're lashing out at me like a wounded animal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3229
text_en: Please tell me why.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3230
text_en: What're you afraid of?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3231
text_en: I don't need your help.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3232
text_en: It's just not something I like to talk about, even with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3233
text_en: You're right. Rip the bandage off.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3234
text_en: It's just not something I like to talk about.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3235
text_en: You're right. Rip the bandage off.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3236
text_en: I don't need your help.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3237
text_en: I'm going to say this in the most affectionate way possible.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3238
text_en: I promise I'll kiss it better once we're done...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3239
text_en: I get it. Believe me. But I'll make sure to get you properly sloshed once this is over.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3240
text_en: Best way to do it, so they say.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3241
text_en: Bollocks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3242
text_en: Bollocks. When people say that, higher chances than not, they're lying.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3243
text_en: I'm gonna hold you to that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3245
text_en: How do I know this?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3246
text_en: Not if I hold you down first.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3247
text_en: I know for a fact that when people say they don't need help, they're almost always lying.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3248
text_en: Heh. That's a new one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3249
text_en: Mmm, shitty Y2K beer...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3250
text_en: I'm not responsible for what happens when I get drunk.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3251
text_en: Yeah, but they don't talk about the screaming, do they?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3252
text_en: All right. Well, here we go...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3253
text_en: It's not so bad...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3254
text_en: I can take a punch.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3255
text_en: No, they don't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3256
text_en: How do I know this?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3257
text_en: Because nine times out of ten, I'm the arse saying it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3258
text_en: When it's all you've got.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3259
text_en: Ahem. Don't distract me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3260
text_en: Because nine times out of ten, I'm the knobhead who's saying it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3261
text_en: You're no fun.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3262
text_en: I was hoping you'd forget what we were talking about.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3263
text_en: Don't distract me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3264
text_en: I'm sorry. I've been avoiding this like the plague, you're right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3265
text_en: I'm sorry. I just really can't do this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3266
text_en: I'm sorry. I've been avoiding this like the plague, you're right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3267
text_en: I just really can't do this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3268
text_en: Then that's that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3269
text_en: Sigh. All right. Then, I think it's best if we take some time off between us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3270
text_en: Think it over.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3271
text_en: Plenty of time for fun later.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3272
text_en: I know. Good effort.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3273
text_en: I know this is a leap of faith. It's a lot to trust someone with something like this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3274
text_en: So, I suppose I'll ask the question outright.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3275
text_en: Do you trust me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3276
text_en: Yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3277
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3278
text_en: Then that's that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3279
text_en: Sigh. All right. Then, I think it's best if we take some time off.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3280
text_en: Think it over.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3281
text_en: You just understand why I've been avoiding it, yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3282
text_en: It doesn't mean I have to like talking about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3283
text_en: Sol above, I am the crowned king of avoiding talking about his problems.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3284
text_en: Nobody likes talking about the things that hurt them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3285
text_en: Yeah. I understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3286
text_en: You're talking to the crowned king of avoiding the topic.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3287
text_en: Then... trust me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3288
text_en: I'm here, love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3289
text_en: I'm here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3290
text_en: Tell me the Tale of Duviri.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3291
text_en: You know the top-level story.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3292
text_en: I've told you the surface level shit.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3293
text_en: Cursed orphan winds up in an alternate reality.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3294
text_en: Abandoned by the Void. Abandoned by the Orokin. Abandoned by *everyone.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3295
text_en: Trapped in a storybook, the stories that others told them plucked out of their mind by the Void.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3296
text_en: A reality created from the stories in their head, abandoned by everyone except the stories themselves.
