name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3297
text_en: Surrounded by *fake* trees and *fake* buildings and *fake* skies.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3298
text_en: And those stories that were buried so deep in that orphan's mind, they wanted to be friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3299
text_en: At first, they were that orphan's best friends. Playmates. "Let's go on adventures!" they cried.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3300
text_en: The orphan could have given up their fear, their sadness, their anger, their envy, their false joy...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3301
text_en: So the orphan embraced them. But it wouldn't last.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3302
text_en: At least... at first.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3303
text_en: But instead, the orphan clung to the only thing they had. Even though it wouldn't last.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3304
text_en: Little by little, that orphan grew up. And his fake best friend became his fake worst enemy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3305
text_en: Because that's the thing about Duviri. None of it's *real.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3306
text_en: Oh, sure. You can take things from it. You can taste it. Smell it. It can make you bleed. Make you die.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3307
text_en: But none of it matters. None of it changes. It's all a lie.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3308
text_en: It's not your fault.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3309
text_en: It is, though. Because this is what I've been avoiding saying:

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3310
text_en: I.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3311
text_en: Am.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3312
text_en: Duviri.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3313
text_en: All of the fear? All of that twisted terror that screams and cries at every shadow?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3314
text_en: All of the sickening false "joy" and beauty smeared on top of it like a bad birthday cake?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3315
text_en: All of that horrid envy and jealousy that poisons everything around it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3316
text_en: All of that rage, that hatred, that burning anger?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3317
text_en: The crushing sorrow that made me want to do nothing but sink to the bottom of an abyss?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3318
text_en: All of that suffering, all of that endless pain, and death?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3319
text_en: That lashes out at everything and everyone around it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3320
text_en: Covering the warts and the rot underneath? Trying to hide what it really is?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3321
text_en: That wants to have what everybody else had? A normal life? A family? Friends?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3322
text_en: That wanted nothing more than to rip the sinew from the bones of the people who had hurt me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3323
text_en: To fall on my own sword, if it wouldn't have been pointless?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3324
text_en: All those insipid courtiers and all the endless executions they put me through?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3325
text_en: It comes from MY head. It isn't just a product of the book, Arthur. It's from ME.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3326
text_en: I did it to myself... all of it. Over, and over... and over... and over...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3327
text_en: Until it just... took it all away. Until I couldn't feel any of it anymore.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3328
text_en: Until feeling nothing was better than feeling anything at all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3329
text_en: It was so bad, Arthur, I began to forget. Forget who I was. What I was.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3330
text_en: Where I came from.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3331
text_en: Maybe I thought, deep down inside, if I forgot about the people I blamed for putting me in Duviri?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3332
text_en: Maybe I thought, deep down inside, if I forgot that Duviri was really all my fault?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3333
text_en: Maybe I thought, deep down inside, that if I forgot everything?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3334
text_en: Maybe then, it'd end... one way or another.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3335
text_en: If it weren't for Lotus and Teshin...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3336
text_en: I'd still be there. A shell. A ghost. Empty. Forgotten and forgetting.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3337
text_en: So, yeah. You can argue with me about it all you want.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3338
text_en: So when I say "Apathy is worse than anything else." That's what I mean.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3339
text_en: But that's why apathy is worse.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3340
text_en: And why I'll never give up fighting it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3341
text_en: And you know what's really weird? I go back. I go back all the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3342
text_en: Because I feel like I have a duty to those people there. They... they exist because of me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3343
text_en: As busted as it is, as messed up as it sounds, it's the only real home I've ever known.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_3653
text_en: How'd that make you feel?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3345
text_en: Nothing works out your anger quite like smashing up a place that you know resets constantly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3346
text_en: Now that I know I can leave it... feels almost... fun again. I can find the joy in it again. As twisted as that is.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3347
text_en: There. That's the story.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3348
text_en: Ta-Da. The End.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3350
text_en: You there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3351
text_en: I'm here, love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3352
text_en: I'm here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3353
text_en: Sol above... I'm here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3354
text_en: Ugh, I think I'm going to cry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3355
text_en: Is that what you wanted to hear? You happy now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3356
text_en: I'd be lying if I said you were the only one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3357
text_en: No. I'm not happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3358
text_en: I'm heartbroken, love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3359
text_en: I'm heartbroken.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3360
text_en: I... I had no idea you blamed yourself for what you went through.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3361
text_en: How could I not? I literally made the place out of my own emotions.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3362
text_en: Yeah, well. We all have our shit to deal with.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3363
text_en: No. Don't do that. Don't dismiss this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3364
text_en: You were a CHILD. Who was forced to hunt down their own parents.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3365
text_en: Who was then left behind, all alone, to face *the Void.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3366
text_en: I'd wager good money that most grown adults - myself included - would crumple like a house of cards...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3367
text_en: If we had to go through what you went through.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3368
text_en: You did the absolute best you could. You survived.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3369
text_en: And look what's become of you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3370
text_en: Savior of the Origin System - or whatever it's called.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3371
text_en: And the one I adore most in this world.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3372
text_en: And one of my dearest friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3373
text_en: So, you don't... think less of me, now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3374
text_en: You're going to make me cry again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3375
text_en: The opposite.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3376
text_en: Yeah, well.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3377
text_en: The absolute opposite.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3378
text_en: Sometimes it's good for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3379
text_en: I swear it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3380
text_en: Or so Lettie tells me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3381
text_en: Thanks. That means... more than you can imagine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3382
text_en: Thanks, Arthur. That means... more to me than you can imagine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3383
text_en: Now I need a damn drink.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo5_3384
text_en: And I'm buying.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3385
text_en: Hey, Drifter. You around?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3386
text_en: Hey, Sweets. You around?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3387
text_en: Sorry, handsome. Another time. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3388
text_en: Yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3389
text_en: Can't chat right now, sorry. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3390
text_en: What's up?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3391
text_en: You've been... I'm not the easiest man to get to know. You've put up with me dodging.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3392
text_en: To be fair, I've been doing the same thing to you about what made me, me. Duviri, and all...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3393
text_en: Talking about the dark parts of our past isn't easy or fun for anybody.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3394
text_en: Yeah. About time you man up, cowboy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3395
text_en: Well, the point is, you've been waiting around trying to get the whole story out of me -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3396
text_en: And immediately? I've changed my mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3397
text_en: how I got here, how I got like this,

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3398
text_en: the rest of the story about this sword,

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3399
text_en: and all the rest of this ugly mess...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3400
text_en: Pour yourself a cup of tea.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3401
text_en: Or a beer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3402
text_en: Actually, a beer would be best.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3403
text_en: I'll try to make this brief. Sol knows I don't want to dwell on this shit any more than I need to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3404
text_en: *Cracking beer.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3405
text_en: Take the time you need. I'm here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3406
text_en: I told you why I left the Britannic Army. I never told you why I joined.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3407
text_en: This skana of mine that you've asked after.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3408
text_en: The bandana I keep on my blade?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3409
text_en: When I was a lad, there was a childhood friend a few years above Eleanor and I in school. Lived a few doors up the street.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3410
text_en: I got it when Entrati ran me through with it. Not long after he turned me into this...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3411
text_en: Eleanor told me her half of the Christopher story already.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3412
text_en: She makes it sound like you both lost someone special.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3413
text_en: Name was Christopher. He was always sticking up for the kids in the neighborhood who needed it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3414
text_en: He was bigger, tougher - smarter. One of those blokes you'd want to push in front of a lorry if he wasn't so damned NICE all the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3415
text_en: In short? I bloody wanted to BE him, growing up. Followed in his footsteps any way I could.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3416
text_en: I... can't thank you enough for being there for her. For finally being someone who might get her past what she lost on that terrible day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3417
text_en: She... lost a lot more than me, that day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3418
text_en: But it sounds like you both lost someone that meant a lot to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3419
text_en: I told you how I got it. Entrati running me through with it. Not long after he turned me into this...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3420
text_en: Ruggedly handsome, sexy, superhero?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3421
text_en: Toaster oven? :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3422
text_en: The word is 'warframe.'

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3423
text_en: You. You're just YOU. Inside. Where it counts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3424
text_en: Heh. Thanks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3425
text_en: Har, har.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3426
text_en: I... will never adjust to that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3427
text_en: Thanks. I need to remember that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3428
text_en: Well. That's how I got the blade.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3429
text_en: But I dodged when you asked me about the bandana.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3430
text_en: But it's not the blade that's important to me. It's the bandana.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3431
text_en: Christopher got it for me... as a gift for joining the Crimson Watch.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3432
text_en: There was... an old friend of mine, way back in the day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3433
text_en: He was planning on giving it to me the night I got there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3434
text_en: It was waiting for me... instead of him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3435
text_en: Christopher? Eleanor told me some of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3436
text_en: It was meant to be a gift. He never got to deliver it to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3437
text_en: What happened to him isn't your fault, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3438
text_en: Yikes... I'm so sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3439
text_en: What happened?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3440
text_en: I'm so sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3441
text_en: I know. But it is my duty to carry on.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3442
text_en: War takes the best of us away.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3443
text_en: He was a dear friend and I looked up to him like a big brother. I idolized him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3444
text_en: Christopher represented everything I wanted to be in this world - noble, heroic, self-sacrificing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3445
text_en: He was bigger, tougher - smarter. One of those blokes you'd want to push in front of a lorry if he wasn't so damned NICE all the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3446
text_en: So when he went off and joined His Majesty's Service, as soon as he was of age? I was biting at the bit, waiting until I was old enough to do the same.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3447
text_en: Imagine poor Eleanor, having to watch her fianc and her twin brother go off to war.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3448
text_en: She never trusted authority. But after what happened to the two of us? She never would again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3449
text_en: I was lucky enough to call my idol my best friend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3450
text_en: So when he went off and joined His Majesty's Service, as soon as he was of age? I was biting at the bit, waiting until I was old enough to do the same.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3451
text_en: Never mind the fact that he...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3452
text_en: Look, Drifter... This part isn't my story to tell. It's Eleanor's. But I'll say this much. When Christopher went off to war?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3453
text_en: I wasn't the only one upset to see him go.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3454
text_en: He must have really meant a lot to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3455
text_en: What happened next?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3456
text_en: He did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3457
text_en: A great deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3458
text_en: Christopher had pulled some strings. Lined it up so that I'd be in the same regiment as him. 3rd Battalion, Crimson Watch.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3459
text_en: But one week before I got out there... there was an incident. Roadside bomb.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3460
text_en: And like so many good men and women? Like so many good soldiers?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3461
text_en: He became just another number on somebody's sheet.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3462
text_en: But I was still a naive fool. And I, like an idiot, was all too eager to pick up the mantle he left behind...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3463
text_en: I'm so sorry, Arthur...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3464
text_en: No one wins in war. No one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3465
text_en: Thank you for being there for her. For helping her heal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3466
text_en: You've helped me heal a lot of that old pain, by being here for me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3467
text_en: But sometimes, an old ghost is a welcome one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3468
text_en: They remind us of why we're still here. Who we were before.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3469
text_en: Who we've lost.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3470
text_en: And who we're still fighting for.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3471
text_en: I... never really had anyone to fight for. Not until recently. One reason they call me 'Drifter.'

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3472
text_en: I've run out of imaginary beers to drink. I kind of need a real one, now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3473
text_en: I can't tell which one of us has had it worse. Both. Neither.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3474
text_en: You haven't had it much better than me, have you, though?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3475
text_en: Creations of war, just in different ways. We've both lost a lot in our lives.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3476
text_en: I... yeah. But. That was... heavy. Drinks? You and me? Then we go find a quiet place to talk in person?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3477
text_en: We've both lost things, yes. But look at how much we've found. Friends. Family. Each other.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3478
text_en: You lost... one guy? All this was about *one* guy? I was expecting something way more dramatic.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3479
text_en: Love, nothing would make me happier right now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3480
text_en: Look at what we've been able to do here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3481
text_en: You're right. Enough of this moody shit for one day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo6_3482
text_en: Sod off, you utter wanker.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3484
text_en: Hey. You there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3485
text_en: Yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3486
text_en: Sorry, can't. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3487
text_en: Can we talk about what you said earlier?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3488
text_en: Forget what I said. Let's pretend it didn't happen. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3489
text_en: ...All right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3490
text_en: I say a lot of things. Remind me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3491
text_en: Sure. What about it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3492
text_en: Suit yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3493
text_en: You don't sound too enthusiastic.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3494
text_en: You don't remember? How often do you go around confessing your feelings for people?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3495
text_en: It's not that, I was just hoping *you'd* forget.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3496
text_en: All the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3497
text_en: Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3498
text_en: I need you to level with me, smartass.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3499
text_en: Did you mean what you said? Yes or no.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3500
text_en: Yes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3501
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3502
text_en: Maybe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3503
text_en: I'll cut you some slack because you've had a messed up life. I don't know why you said if you didn't mean it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3504
text_en: I'm not sure what I expected...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3505
text_en: But, Arthur.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3506
text_en: I told you how I felt, and you left me hanging.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3507
text_en: But honestly? I don't care. Don't do it again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3511
text_en: Why're you embarrassed?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3508
text_en: Because I changed my mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3509
text_en: You left me hanging.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3510
text_en: It's embarrassing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3512
text_en: I'll cut you some slack because you've had a messed up life. I don't know why you said if you didn't mean it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3513
text_en: But honestly? I don't care. Don't do it again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3514
text_en: I'm supposed to be "the boss" now, right? The one in charge.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3515
text_en: I mean. I showed you my hand. And you peaced out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3516
text_en: Doesn't mean you can't be vulnerable. Trust me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3517
text_en: I needed to think.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3518
text_en: Don't make my mistakes. Don't let yourself get cold.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3519
text_en: About?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3520
text_en: And?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3521
text_en: And...that's part of what you've shown me since you've arrived.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3522
text_en: How cold I've grown. How closed off. Even to my friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3523
text_en: You. Us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3524
text_en: Things have changed. A lot. In such a short span of time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3525
text_en: This.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3526
text_en: I'd be a fool not to let myself change with it. To not be willing to at least try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3527
text_en: When you arrived, I saw someone *just* like me - someone who wasn't really living, just surviving.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3528
text_en: Then...I saw you come alive.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3529
text_en: Because of us. Maybe even...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3530
text_en: Because of me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3531
text_en: And that gave me hope. Hope I haven't allowed myself to have in a long time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3532
text_en: So...I had to think. And I'm sorry if that rubbed you the wrong way. But I had to let myself come to terms with the fact that, well.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3533
text_en: I'd really love that. [Date Arthur.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3534
text_en: I feel the same way about you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3535
text_en: So. Shall we make this official? Make this a "thing?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3536
text_en: I'm sorry. I'm not ready for this. [Do not date Arthur.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurConfession_3537
text_en: lol no [Do not date Arthur.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3538
text_en: Well, then. Let's see where the future takes us, hm?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3539
text_en: I can respect that. Let me know if you change your mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3540
text_en: Every time I think you can't get any more deranged...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurConfession_3541
text_en: I, for one, am looking forward to it for the first time in...ages.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3542
text_en: You around, sweets?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3543
text_en: You around, Drifter?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3544
text_en: Yeah, A?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3545
text_en: What's up, sweetheart?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3546
text_en: [Ignore.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3547
text_en: What's up?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3548
text_en: Yeah, A?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3549
text_en: You're pregnant?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3550
text_en: There's something I need to tell you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3551
text_en: Ugh. I've been trying to figure out how to do this for *days* now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3552
text_en: Are you breaking up with me...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3553
text_en: Take your time - I'm here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3554
text_en: When you arrived, I figured you were just another obstacle.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3555
text_en: Just more bullshit for me to overcome, like everything else in my life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3556
text_en: If you had told me, that day we first crossed swords... how you would go on to change my life?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3557
text_en: That you'd save my life? That you'd save ALL our lives?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3558
text_en: I'd have laughed in your sodding face.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3559
text_en: What?! NO! How would that even --

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3560
text_en: No! No. Absolutely not. I'm just...shit at expressing this kind of thing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3561
text_en: Thanks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3562
text_en: Weirder things've happened...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3563
text_en: Albrecht didn't tell you..?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3564
text_en: Joking! Joking.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3565
text_en: Thanks?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3566
text_en: I don't even want to know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3567
text_en: Don't distract me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3568
text_en: ...... I am *really trying* to have a serious moment here...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3569
text_en: When you arrived, I figured you were just another obstacle.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3570
text_en: Just more bullshit for me to overcome, like everything else in my life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3571
text_en: Where's this going?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3572
text_en: What I'm saying is,

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3573
text_en: I'm getting there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3574
text_en: There are very few times in your life you meet someone who understands you instinctually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3575
text_en: Who gets you almost better than you get yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3576
text_en: If you had told me, that day we first crossed swords...how you would go on to change my life?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3577
text_en: That you'd save my life? That you'd save ALL our lives?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3578
text_en: Who knows how to tell you what you need to hear, not what you want to hear.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3579
text_en: I'd have laughed in your sodding face.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3580
text_en: What I'm trying to tell you is - thanks for being not just a friend, but being someone I can trust.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3581
text_en: And I'm not talking about the obvious -Albrecht and the Major and all the rest of that nonsense.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3582
text_en: Not just to watch my back, not just to join the team, but... someone I can trust with my life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3583
text_en: I'm *still* not forgiving you for that spaghetti, though.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3584
text_en: That...means a lot, thanks Arthur. And it's mutual.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3585
text_en: Yeah, I've just been fooling you this whole time. Sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3586
text_en: I'm talking about something much more important. I'm talking about what you've meant to *me.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3587
text_en: Shit. I. Sol above, I don't know how to say this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3588
text_en: I think I know what you're going to say. Want me to go first?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3589
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3641
text_en: You're making me fall asleep over here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3590
text_en: (That's a heart btw)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3591
text_en: Heh. Thanks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3592
text_en: I never thought it was possible.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3593
text_en: Not like this. Not in a place like this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3595
text_en: Sod. Off.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3596
text_en: This was a mistake. We're done.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3597
text_en: And certainly not for someone like me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3598
text_en: But...Drifter?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3599
text_en: Wait. I was just joking! [Apologize.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3600
text_en: Oh, chill out, dude.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3601
text_en: Time you learned sometimes your sense of humour isn't welcome.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3602
text_en: After all we've been through...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3603
text_en: I love you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3604
text_en: I think we should just be friends. [Break up.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3605
text_en: I love you, too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3606
text_en: I...oh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3607
text_en: Oh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3642
text_en: Yeah. Maybe you should.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3608
text_en: I think we should just be friends. [Break up.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3609
text_en: I love you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3610
text_en: I never thought it was possible.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3611
text_en: Not like this. Not in a place like this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3612
text_en: And certainly not for someone like me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3613
text_en: But...Drifter?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3614
text_en: After all we've been through...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3615
text_en: I love you, too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3616
text_en: I...all right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3617
text_en: That's...unexpected.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3618
text_en: But I suppose I understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3619
text_en: Better to end things now than to let things get more complicated.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3620
text_en: If you change your mind, I...I'll be here, love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3621
text_en: I thought this kind of happiness wasn't possible for me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3622
text_en: Thank you for showing me I was wrong, love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3623
text_en: Here's to the future.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3624
text_en: And here's to us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3640
text_en: Oh for the love of -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3625
text_en: lolol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank6Convo1_3626
text_en: I'm just teasing. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3627
text_en: Yeah, yeah. Heh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3628
text_en: *Anyway.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3629
text_en: Screw. You.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3630
text_en: I'm sorry it took so long to admit it. But I'm glad you're here. We'd all be dead without you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3631
text_en: So, Drifter?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3632
text_en: Thanks. For everything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3633
text_en: And whatever life brings our way?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank6Convo1_3634
text_en: I know we'll handle it. Together.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3635
text_en: But maybe if that was the worst of it, being abandoned?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3636
text_en: And the orphan, so scared, and so sad, and so angry, and so envious of those who got away, was eager to pretend to be joyous...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo5_3637
text_en: And the orphan, so scared, and so sad, and so angry, and so envious of those who got away, was eager to pretend to be joyous...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3638
text_en: I can't say I blame her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo6_3639
text_en: No kidding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_3643
text_en: A fish named Murky.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_3644
text_en: I put him in the tank, the water turned gray a minute later.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_3645
text_en: Thought he was going to pop off.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_3646
text_en: Little bugger lasted thirteen years.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_3647
text_en: I assume you fixed the water issue.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo1_3648
text_en: Aw. That's cute.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_3649
text_en: Yes, I fixed the damn water.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_3650
text_en: Couldn't be trusted with anything bigger.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo1_3651
text_en: Just wasn't that kind of kid, is all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo2_3660
text_en: Thanks. That means a lot.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_3662
text_en: Yeah. Siblings.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo5_3663
text_en: I meant more like siblings. Cousins. Etc.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3668
text_en: Well.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3669
text_en: Well, what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3670
text_en: Ah. Yeah. Well.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3671
text_en: I suppose I shouldn't have expected you to stay single for long.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3672
text_en: Grow up, Arthur. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3673
text_en: Oh...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3674
text_en: I'm happy for you both.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3675
text_en: You sound thrilled.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3676
text_en: I'm sorry?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3677
text_en: I had to follow my heart.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3678
text_en: What can I say?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3679
text_en: Yeah, well. "Sorry" doesn't always cut it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3680
text_en: I'm glad you finally did. Just wish you had the first time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3681
text_en: I hope you find happiness this time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3682
text_en: Well, now I have the answer to why you're hanging around here so much.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3683
text_en: When you could simply just go back to the future and stay there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3684
text_en: Oh, grow up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3685
text_en: Jealous?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3686
text_en: What do you mean?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3687
text_en: I know I've left you hanging, while I've tried to sort things out. But given our situation, I think I had every right to take some time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3688
text_en: Should I be?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3689
text_en: I figured you didn't have feelings for me in return.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3690
text_en: I never said that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3691
text_en: I suppose I'm surprised, is all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3703
text_en: Yeah, well, I got sick of waiting.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3692
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3693
text_en: If any one of us idiots deserve to be happy, it's her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3694
text_en: I'll do my best not to screw this up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3695
text_en: All I can ask.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3696
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Eleanor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3697
text_en: She deserves peace. I hope you can bring her some.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3698
text_en: What if I said my relationship was a lie, and I still had feelings for you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3699
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3700
text_en: He could use the confidence having a partner can bring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3701
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Quincy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3702
text_en: He needs to learn to let someone in now and then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3704
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Lettie.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3705
text_en: She needs someone she can share the pain with. Not just physical, either.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3706
text_en: So, do you just go about confessing your feelings to everybody and seeing who bites the lure?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3707
text_en: Or are your feelings for Aoi *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3708
text_en: Because if any of us deserve to be happy, it's her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3709
text_en: Or are your feelings for Eleanor *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3710
text_en: Because if you hurt her, I'm not responsible if she decides to scramble your brain.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3711
text_en: Or are your feelings for Amir *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3712
text_en: The last thing that man needs is to have his confidence in himself shaken again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3713
text_en: Or are your feelings for Quincy *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3714
text_en: That man doesn't let people in. You screw that up, it might be the last time he does.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3715
text_en: Or are your feelings for Lettie *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3716
text_en: Because she hurts enough without you adding onto the pile, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3717
text_en: No, it's you I really have feelings for... I just gave up hope.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3718
text_en: My relationship is real. I promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3719
text_en: So you're just stringing them along?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3720
text_en: Yeah...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3721
text_en: I mean, I can have feelings for more than one person.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3722
text_en: Deplorable.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3723
text_en: Sure, but I can't. And I'm not comfortable with this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3724
text_en: I sincerely hope so. For all our sakes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3725
text_en: Oh. And mate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3726
text_en: You can forget about anything ever happening between us. We can stay friends, but that's all it'll be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3727
text_en: I'm sure you *understand.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3728
text_en: I know you and Aoi used to be more than friends...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3729
text_en: I know you and Aoi are friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3730
text_en: Hm.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3731
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3732
text_en: Good to have that sorted.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3733
text_en: I'm not jealous, Drifter.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3734
text_en: Sad, maybe. Watching you make her happy in a way I never could.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3735
text_en: But that's the thing. She's happy when she's with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3736
text_en: If there's one of us knobheads that deserves to be happy, it's her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3737
text_en: So, do me a favour, if you could? Try not to break her heart if you can help it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3738
text_en: I'll do my best.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3739
text_en: No promises.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3740
text_en: All I can ask.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3741
text_en: Speaking of knobheads...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3742
text_en: I'm happy for you and Eleanor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3743
text_en: She deserves peace. I hope you can bring her some.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3744
text_en: I'm happy for you and Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3745
text_en: He could use the confidence having a partner can bring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3746
text_en: I'm happy for you and Quincy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3747
text_en: He needs to learn to let someone in now and then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3748
text_en: I'm happy for you and Lettie.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3749
text_en: She needs someone she can share the pain with. Not just physical, either.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3750
text_en: I'll do my best not to screw this up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3751
text_en: What if I said my relationship was a lie, and I have feelings for you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3752
text_en: All I can ask.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3753
text_en: Deplorable. Stringing someone along like that - someone who trusts you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3754
text_en: I'll do you a favour and keep this between us, mate - in hopes that this is your dark sense of humour showing up again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank5Convo7_3755
text_en: You're the one I *really* have feelings for.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank5Convo7_3756
text_en: I'm happy for you and Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3757
text_en: Hm? Oh, fine. You?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3762
text_en: Mate, we just spoke an hour ago, about-

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAmirHack_3758
text_en: Heeeey... Arthur... how's it going?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAmirHack_3759
text_en: Great... Sooooo... what's new with you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAmirHack_3760
text_en: Some weather we're having, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAmirHack_3761
text_en: How about that local sport's team, yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3763
text_en: It becomes a little less interesting when it's the same every-

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3764
text_en: What local sports-

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3765
text_en: What's going on? You're acting strange.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAmirHack_3766
text_en: ... Nothing's going on.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAmirHack_3767
text_en: Amir's bored again. Look at your username.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3768
text_en: I don't believe you, I-

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3769
text_en: Wait.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3770
text_en: BROODSWORD?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3771
text_en: I do NOT brood!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAmirHack_3772
text_en: :| Buddy. That icon says otherwise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAmirHack_3773
text_en: Yeah you do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurAmirHack_3774
text_en: Eh, he's just teasing. You know he adores you. lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3775
text_en: ... Fine. Fine. Maybe I brood a little.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3776
text_en: Sigh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3777
text_en: Just... get him to change it back, will you? Before anybody else notices.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurAmirHack_3778
text_en: That boy is the definition of idle hands... we need to get him more hobbies...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3779
text_en: Hey Arthur, what do you think about "Fables & Frontiers?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3780
text_en: Arthur, I have a favor to ask for Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3781
text_en: Oh, no... he got you, too?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3782
text_en: Oh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3783
text_en: He's already asked, I take it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3784
text_en: He was just telling me about the game, and I said I'd ask people if they wanted to play.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3785
text_en: He was telling me about this game he wants to play with everybody. Fables & Frontiers?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3786
text_en: There's this dorky game he wants to play, I said I'd ask everybody to join.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3787
text_en: Yes, and before you ask me, I've already said no.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3788
text_en: Pass, sorry. Better things to do in a warzone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3789
text_en: He's on that again? I thought he gave up after Quincy started using the figurines for target practice.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3790
text_en: Don't tell me. It's that Frogs & Follies thing again?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3791
text_en: I think we could all use a break, don't you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3792
text_en: I think it'd mean a lot to him if we played.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3793
text_en: LOL. Fables & Frontiers, yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3794
text_en: Yeah, I'm just asking to make him happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3795
text_en: I have better things to do in a warzone. Sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3796
text_en: We all have our own ways to unwind. Sorry. Pass.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3797
text_en: How so?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3798
text_en: He feels like the odd man out, sometimes. I think a "group game" would help him feel more like part of the pack.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank2Convo6_3799
text_en: I think showing interest in his interests would make him feel less like an outsider. Like people cared.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3800
text_en: We all have our own hobbies. Pass, sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3801
text_en: Hmm.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3802
text_en: All right... fine. I'm in. Just to try it - no long commitments.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank2Convo6_3803
text_en: If it gets *weird* I'm out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo6_3804
text_en: Arthur, about that Fables & Frontiers game - it'll mean a lot to both Amir and I if you play.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo6_3805
text_en: Hey, Arthur - I know you already said no to that game of Fables & Frontiers, but I think it'll be fun.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo6_3806
text_en: Hey, do you want to play Fables & Frontiers with Amir and I? I think it'll be fun.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo6_3807
text_en: Hey Arthur. Amir is putting together a game of Fables & Frontiers, and it'd mean a lot to both of us if you'd join.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo6_3808
text_en: I think it'd be a lot of fun, and a good bonding experience for all of us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo6_3809
text_en: He feels like the odd man out - the non-military one, the nerd, kind of on the outside. It'd mean a lot to him if we all sat down and played one of his games with him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo6_3810
text_en: Really? Why's it so important?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo6_3811
text_en: We have very different definitions of "fun." Sorry, pass.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo6_3812
text_en: Yeah... that's fair. All right, I'll play. Count me in.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo6_3813
text_en: You kids enjoy yourself, though.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo6_3814
text_en: At least for one night, to see how it goes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3815
text_en: Well, now I have the answer to why you're hanging around here so much.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3816
text_en: When you could simply just go back to the future and stay there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3817
text_en: Oh, grow up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3818
text_en: Jealous?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3819
text_en: I know I've left you hanging, while I've tried to sort things out. But given our situation, I think I had every right to take some time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3820
text_en: I suppose I'm surprised, is all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3821
text_en: I figured you didn't have feelings for me in return.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3822
text_en: I never said that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3823
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3824
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Eleanor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3825
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3826
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Quincy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3827
text_en: But I'm happy for you and Lettie.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3828
text_en: If any one of us idiots deserve to be happy, it's her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3829
text_en: She deserves peace. I hope you can bring her some.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3830
text_en: He could use the confidence having a partner can bring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3831
text_en: He needs to learn to let someone in now and then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3832
text_en: She needs someone she can share the pain with. Not just physical, either.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3833
text_en: I'll do my best not to screw this up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3834
text_en: What if I said my relationship was a lie, and I still had feelings for you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3835
text_en: All I can ask.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3836
text_en: Yeah, well, I got sick of waiting.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3837
text_en: So, do you just go about confessing your feelings to everybody and seeing who bites the lure?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3838
text_en: Or are your feelings for Aoi *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3839
text_en: Or are your feelings for Eleanor *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3840
text_en: Or are your feelings for Amir *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3841
text_en: Or are your feelings for Quincy *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3842
text_en: Or are your feelings for Lettie *actually* legitimate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3843
text_en: Because if any of us deserve to be happy, it's her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3844
text_en: Because if you hurt her, I'm not responsible if she decides to scramble your brain.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3845
text_en: The last thing that man needs is to have his confidence in himself shaken again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3846
text_en: That man doesn't let people in. You screw that up, it might be the last time he does.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3847
text_en: Because she hurts enough without you adding onto the pile, mate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3848
text_en: No, it's you I really have feelings for... I just gave up hope.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3849
text_en: My relationship is real. I promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3850
text_en: So you're just stringing them along?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3851
text_en: I sincerely hope so. For all our sakes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3852
text_en: Oh. And mate?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3853
text_en: I mean, I can have feelings for more than one person.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3854
text_en: Yeah...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3855
text_en: Deplorable.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3856
text_en: Sure, but I can't. And I'm not comfortable with this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3857
text_en: You can forget about anything ever happening between us. We can stay friends, but that's all it'll be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3858
text_en: I'm sure you *understand.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3859
text_en: Should I be?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3860
text_en: What do you mean?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3861
text_en: I'm happy for you and Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3862
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3863
text_en: You're the one I *really* have feelings for.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3864
text_en: I know you and Aoi used to be more than friends...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3865
text_en: I know you and Aoi are friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3866
text_en: Good to have that sorted.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3867
text_en: I'm happy for you and Eleanor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3868
text_en: I'm happy for you and Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3869
text_en: I'm happy for you and Quincy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3870
text_en: I'm happy for you and Lettie.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3871
text_en: She deserves peace. I hope you can bring her some.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3872
text_en: He could use the confidence having a partner can bring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3873
text_en: He needs to learn to let someone in now and then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3874
text_en: She needs someone she can share the pain with. Not just physical, either.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3875
text_en: Hm.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3876
text_en: I'm not jealous, Drifter.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3877
text_en: Sad, maybe. Watching you make her happy in a way I never could.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3878
text_en: But that's the thing. She's happy when she's with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3879
text_en: If there's one of us knobheads that deserves to be happy, it's her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3880
text_en: So, do me a favour, if you could? Try not to break her heart if you can help it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3881
text_en: All I can ask.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3882
text_en: I'll do my best not to screw this up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3883
text_en: What if I said my relationship was a lie, and I have feelings for you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3884
text_en: Deplorable. Stringing someone along like that - someone who trusts you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3885
text_en: I'll do you a favour and keep this between us, mate - in hopes that this is your dark sense of humor showing up again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3886
text_en: I'll do my best.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3887
text_en: All I can ask.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank4Convo5_3888
text_en: No promises.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo5_3889
text_en: Speaking of knobheads...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank1Convo2_3890
text_en: Heh.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank4Convo4_3891
text_en: *Eleanor.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank3Convo3_3892
text_en: Why join with them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_3893
text_en: Although, maybe now we're even after that drink *you* owe *me.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_3894
text_en: (I told Aoi to remind you, about my saving your arse.)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_3895
text_en: Either way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_3896
text_en: I'm glad you two are making friends, but... either way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_3897
text_en: Although, maybe now we're even after that drink *you* owe *me.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurRank3Convo4_3898
text_en: After whatever nonsense is going on between you and Aoi with some crack about On-lyne?
