name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3899
text_en: How in the ever-loving bloody hell did you convince *Quincy* of all people to speak to me on your behalf?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurQuincyWingman_3900
text_en: I just needed to apologize to you, and didn't know how else to do it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurQuincyWingman_3901
text_en: I... just didn't know how else to tell you I had feelings for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurQuincyWingman_3902
text_en: I have no clue what you're talking about. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3903
text_en: Mm...hm.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3904
text_en: Points for the surprise factor, I suppose. I certainly wasn't expecting that. And... very well. Apology accepted.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3905
text_en: I do have to admit you've been on my mind a great deal lately.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3906
text_en: You did have a shot with me, and you chose to walk away. But... Quincy was convincing. If you'd like to give this another go, I'm willing to give it a try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3907
text_en: How about walking up to me in the Hub, and simply saying, 'mate, I have feelings for you?' Did that ever cross your mind?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3908
text_en: If you'd like to give this a go, I'm willing to give it a try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurQuincyWingman_3909
text_en: ...No, honestly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3910
text_en: Sometimes I simply do not know what to do with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3912
text_en: Well. No point in fussing about it now. I... have to admit you've been on my mind. If you'd like to give this a go, I'm willing to give it a try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurQuincyWingman_3913
text_en: Yeah. :) I would.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurQuincyWingman_3914
text_en: Actually, I change my mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3915
text_en: Well. Glad to have all that sorted then. Shall we?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurQuincyWingman_3916
text_en: ...Has anyone ever told you, you are *proper* nuts?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurBirthdayConvo1_3917
text_en: I know you're busy, but I just wanted to say Happy Birthday. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurBirthdayConvo1_3918
text_en: Happy Birthday! (You do know what being "happy" is, right?)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurBirthdayConvo1_3919
text_en: Never too busy for a birthday greeting, mate. Appreciate it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurBirthdayConvo1_3920
text_en: I do. Do you know what being funny is?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurBirthdayConvo2_3921
text_en: Wonderful. Now I have two of you who wont ever let that drop.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurBirthdayConvo2_3922
text_en: Thanks! Nice of you to remember. I might knock off half an hour early today. Not decided yet.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurBirthdayConvo2_3923
text_en: Happy Birthday, Arthur. Any plans?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurBirthdayConvo2_3924
text_en: Happy Birthday to Eleanors little brother!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurBirthdayConvo3_3925
text_en: Look, I know youve been through a lot yourself, but theres a time and a place for gallows humour.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/TxtArthur_ArthurBirthdayConvo3_3926
text_en: Weve had some close calls, havent we? Thanks for having my back, today and every other day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurBirthdayConvo3_3927
text_en: Hi. Just wanted to say happy birthday. Glad I was here to see it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurBirthdayConvo3_3928
text_en: Happy Birthday. Try extra hard not to die today. It'd ruin the vibe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/ArthurRomance/Choice_ArthurRank1Convo4_3929
text_en: I died so many times, I stopped caring.
